original: Namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa
analyzed: namaḥ tassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa

original: Dīghanikāye
analyzed: dīgha nikāye

original: Sīlakkhandhavaggaṭīkā
Ganthārambhakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: gantha ārambha kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Saṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayavandanā saṃvaṇṇetabbassa dhammassa pabhavanissayavisuddhipaṭivedanatthaṃ,
analyzed: saṃvaṇṇanā ārambhe ratana taya vandanā saṃvaṇṇetabbassa dhammassa pabhava nissaya visuddhi paṭivedana attham

original: taṃ pana dhammasaṃvaṇṇanāsu viññūnaṃ bahumānuppādanatthaṃ, taṃ sammadeva tesaṃ uggahadhāraṇādikkamaladdhabbāya
analyzed: tam pana dhamma saṃvaṇṇanāsu viññūnam bahu māna uppādana attham tam sammat eva tesam uggaha dhāraṇā ādikkama laddhabbāya

original: sammāpaṭipattiyā sabbahitasukhanipphādanatthaṃ. Atha vā maṅgalabhāvato, sabbakiriyāsu
analyzed: sammā paṭipattiyā sabba hita sukha nipphādana attham atha vā maṅgala bhāvataḥ sabba kiriyāsu

analyzed: pubba kicca bhāvataḥ paṇḍitehi sammā carita bhāvataḥ āyatim paresam diṭṭha anugati āpajjanato

analyzed: ca saṃvaṇṇanāyam ratanattaya paṇāma kiriyā atha vā ratanattaya paṇāma karaṇam pūjanīya pūjā puñña visesa nibbattana attham

original: taṃ attano yathāladdhasampattinimittakassa kammassa balānuppādanatthaṃ, antarā ca
analyzed: tam attanaḥ yathā laddha sampatti nimittakassa kammassa bala an uppādana attham antarā ca

original: ca payojanaṃ ācariyena idhādhippetaṃ. Tathā hi vakkhati – “iti me pasannamatino…pe…

original: tassānubhāvenā”ti. Vatthuttayapūjā hi niratisayapuññakkhettasambuddhiyā aparimeyyappabhāvo
analyzed: tassa anubhāvena ati vatthuttaya pūjā hi niratisaya puñña kkhetta sambuddhiyāḥ aparimeyya ppabhāvaḥ

analyzed: bahuvidha antarāye api loka sannivāse antarāya nibandhana sakala saṃkilesa viddhaṃsanāya

original: “Pūjārahe pūjayato, buddhe yadi va sāvake”tiādi, tathā –

original: “Ye bhikkhave buddhe pasannā, agge te pasannā. Agge kho pana pasannānaṃ aggo vipāko hotī”tiādi.

original: “Buddhoti kittayantassa, kāye bhavati yā pīti;
analyzed: buddhā uti kittayantassa kāye bhavati yā pi iti

original: Varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenapi jambudīpassa.
analyzed: varam eva hi sā kasiṇena api jambudīpassa

analyzed: tathā

original: “Yasmiṃ, mahānāma, samaye ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosa…pe… na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hotī”tiādi,

original: “Araññe rukkhamūle vā…pe…
analyzed: araññe rukkha mūle vāpe

analyzed: bhayam vā chambhitattam vā

original: Lomahaṃso na hessatī”ti. ca
analyzed: lomahaṃsaḥ na hessati iti ca

original: Tattha yassa vatthuttayassa vandanaṃ kattukāmo, tassa guṇātisayayogasandassanatthaṃ

original: “karuṇāsītalahadaya”ntiādinā gāthattayamāha. Guṇātisayayogena hi vandanārahabhāvo,
analyzed: guṇa ati saya yogena hi

original: vandanārahe ca katā vandanā yathādhippetappayojanaṃ sādhetīti. Tattha yassā desanāya
analyzed: vandanā rahe ca katā vandanā yathā adhippeta payojanam sādheti iti tattha yassā desanāya

original: saṃvaṇṇanaṃ kattukāmo, sā na vinayadesanā viya karuṇāppadhānā, nāpi abhidhammadesanā

original: viya paññāppadhānā, atha kho karuṇāpaññāppadhānāti tadubhayappadhānameva tāva sammāsambuddhassa
analyzed: paññā appadhānā atha kho karuṇā paññā appadhānā ti tad ubhaya ppadhānam eva tāva sammāsambuddhassa

original: thomanaṃ kātuṃ taṃmūlakattā sesaratanānaṃ “karuṇāsītalahadaya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: thomanam kātum sesa ratanānam vuttaṃ

original: Tattha kiratīti karuṇā, paradukkhaṃ vikkhipati, apanetīti attho. Atha vā kiṇātīti
analyzed: tattha kirati iti karuṇā para dukkham vikkhipati apaneti iti attho atha vā kiṇāti iti

original: karuṇā, paradukkhe sati kāruṇikaṃ hiṃsati, vibādhatīti attho, paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ
analyzed: karuṇā para dukkhe sati kāruṇikam hiṃsati vibādhati iti attho para dukkhe sati sādhūnam

original: kampanaṃ hadayakhedaṃ karotīti vā karuṇā. Atha vā kamiti sukhaṃ, taṃ rundhatīti karuṇā.
analyzed: kampanam hadaya khedam karoti iti vā karuṇā atha vā kam iti sukham tam rundhati iti karuṇā

original: Esā hi paradukkhāpanayanakāmatālakkhaṇā, attasukhanirapekkhatāya kāruṇikānaṃ sukhaṃ
analyzed: esā hi para dukkha apanayana kāma tā lakkhaṇā atta sukha nirapekkha tāya kāruṇikānam sukham

original: rundhati vibandhatīti. Karuṇāya sītalaṃ karuṇāsītalaṃ, karuṇāsītalaṃ hadayaṃ assāti
analyzed: rundhati vibandhati iti karuṇāya sītalam karuṇā sītalam karuṇā sītalam hadayam

original: karuṇāsītalahadayo, taṃ karuṇāsītalahadayaṃ. Tattha kiñcāpi paresaṃ hitopasaṃhārasukhādiaparihānicchanasabhāvatāya,
analyzed: tam karuṇā sīta lahadayam kiñca api paresam hita upasaṃhāra sukha ādi a parihāni chana sabhāva tāya

original: byāpādāratīnaṃ ujuvipaccanīkatāya ca sattasantānagatasantāpavicchedanākārappavattiyā
analyzed: byāpāda aratīnam uju vipaccanīka tāya ca satta santāna gata santāpa vicchedana ākāra ppavattiyā

original: mettāmuditānampi cittasītalabhāvakāraṇatā upalabbhati, tathāpi dukkhāpanayanākārappavattiyā
analyzed: mettā muditānam pi citta sītala bhāva kāraṇa tā upalabbhati tathā api dukkha apanayana ākāra ppavattiyā

original: parūpatāpāsahanarasā avihiṃsābhūtā karuṇā visesena bhagavato cittassa cittapassaddhi
analyzed: avihiṃsā bhūtā karuṇā visesena bhagavato cittassa citta passaddhi

original: viya sītībhāvanimittanti vuttaṃ “karuṇāsītalahadaya”nti. Karuṇāmukhena vā mettāmuditānampi
analyzed: viya sītībhāva nimittanti vuttam karuṇā sīta lahadayanti karuṇā mukhena vā

original: hadayasītalabhāvakāraṇatā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: hadaya sītala bhāva kāraṇatā vuttā iti daṭṭhabbam

original: Atha vā asādhāraṇañāṇavisesanibandhanabhūtā sātisayaṃ niravasesañca sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ
analyzed: atha vā asādhāraṇa ñāṇa visesa nibandhana bhūtā sa atisayam niravasesam ca sabbaññuta ññāṇam

original: viya savisayabyāpitāya mahākaruṇābhāvaṃ upagatā karuṇāva bhagavato atisayena hadayasītalabhāvahetūti
analyzed: sa visaya byāpitāya mahā karuṇā bhāvam upagatā bhagavataḥ atisayena hadaya sītala bhāva hetu uti

original: āha “karuṇāsītalahadaya”nti. Atha vā satipi mettāmuditānaṃ sātisaye hadayasītībhāvanibandhanatte
analyzed: āha atha vā satipi

original: sakalabuddhaguṇavisesakāraṇatāya tāsampi kāraṇanti karuṇāva bhagavato hadayasītalabhāvakāraṇaṃ
analyzed: sakala buddha guṇa visesa kāraṇatāya tāsam pi bhagavataḥ hadaya sītala bhāva kāraṇam

original: vuttā. Karuṇānidānā hi sabbepi buddhaguṇā. Karuṇānubhāvanibbāpiyamānasaṃsāradukkhasantāpassa
analyzed: vuttā karuṇā nidānā hi sabbe pi buddha guṇā karuṇā anubhāva nibbāpiyamāna saṃsāra dukkha santāpassa

original: hi bhagavato paradukkhāpanayanakāmatāya anekānipi asaṅkheyyāni kappānaṃ akilantarūpasseva
analyzed: hi bhagavato para dukkha apanayana kāma tāya anekāni api asaṅkheyyāni kappānam a kilanta rūpassa iva

original: niravasesabuddhakaradhammasambharaṇaniyatassa samadhigatadhammādhipateyyassa ca sannihitesupi
analyzed: niravasesa buddha kara dhamma sambharaṇa niyatassa samadhigata dhamma ādhipateyyassa ca sannihitesu pi

original: sattasaṅkhārasamupanītahadayūpatāpanimittesu na īsakampi cittasītībhāvassaññathattamahosīti.
analyzed: satta saṅkhāra samupanīta hadaya upatāpa nimittesu na citta sītībhāvaḥ saññathattam ahosi iti

original: Etasmiñca atthavikappe tīsupi avatthāsu bhagavato karuṇā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: etasmin ca attha vikappe tīsu pi avatthāsu bhagavato karuṇā saṅgahitā iti daṭṭhabbam

original: Pajānātīti paññā, yathāsabhāvaṃ pakārehi paṭivijjhatīti attho. Paññāva ñeyyāvaraṇappahānato
analyzed: pajānāti iti paññā yathā sabhāvam pakārehi paṭivijjhati iti attho paññā va ñeyya āvaraṇa pahānato

analyzed: pakārehi dhamma sabhāva avajotana ṭṭhena pajjoto ti paññāpajjoto sa vāsanā pahānataḥ visesena

original: hataṃ samugghāṭitaṃ vihataṃ, paññāpajjotena vihataṃ paññāpajjotavihataṃ. Muyhanti
analyzed: hatam samugghāṭitam vihatam paññāpajjotena vihatam paññāpajjota vihatam muyhanti

original: tena, sayaṃ vā muyhati, mohanamattameva vā tanti moho, avijjā, sveva visayasabhāvapaṭicchādanato
analyzed: tena sayam vā muyhati mohana mattam eva vā mohaḥ avijjā svā iva visaya sabhāva paṭicchādanato

original: andhakārasarikkhatāya tamo viyāti tamo, paññāpajjotavihato mohatamo etassāti paññāpajjotavihatamohatamo,
analyzed: andhakāra sa rikkha tāya tamaḥ viyā ati tamo paññā pajjota vihataḥ moha tamo etassa ati paññā pajjota vihata moha tamo

original: taṃ paññāpajjotavihatamohatamaṃ. Sabbesampi hi khīṇāsavānaṃ satipi paññāpajjotena
analyzed: tam paññāpajjota vihata mohatamam sabbesam pi hi khīṇāsavānam sati pi paññāpajjotena

original: avijjāndhakārassa vihatabhāve saddhādhimuttehi viya diṭṭhippattānaṃ sāvakehi, paccekasambuddhehi
analyzed: avijjā andhakārassa vihata bhāve saddhā adhimuttehi viya diṭṭhippattānam sāvakehi paccekasambuddhehi

original: ca savāsanappahānena sammāsambuddhānaṃ kilesappahānassa viseso vijjatīti sātisayena
analyzed: ca sa vāsanā pahānena sammāsambuddhānam kilesa ppahānassa visesaḥ vijjati iti sa atisayena

original: avijjāppahānena bhagavantaṃ thomento āha “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti.
analyzed: avijjā ppahānena bhagavantam thomentaḥ āha paññā pajja uta vihata moha taman ti

original: Atha vā antarena paropadesaṃ attano santāne accantaṃ avijjāndhakāravigamassa nibbattitattā,
analyzed: atha vā antarena para upadesam attano santāne accantam avijja andhakāra vigamassa

original: tattha ca sabbaññutāya, balesu ca vasībhāvassa samadhigatattā, parasantatiyañca dhammadesanātisayānubhāvena
analyzed: tattha ca sabbaññu tāya balesu ca vasībhāvassa samadhigata ttā para santatiyam ca dhamma desanā atisaya anubhāvena

original: sammadeva tassa pavattitattā bhagavāva visesato mohatamavigamena thometabboti āha
analyzed: sammat eva tassa pavatti tattā bhagavā ava visesataḥ moha tama vigamena thometabbaḥ iti āha

original: “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti. Imasmiñca atthavikappe “paññāpajjoto”ti padena bhagavato
analyzed: imasmin ca attha vikappe paññāpajjota uti padena bhagavataḥ

original: paṭivedhapaññā viya desanāpaññāpi sāmaññaniddesena ekasesanayena vā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: paṭivedha paññā viya desanā paññā api sāmañña niddesena ekasesa nayena vā saṅgahitā ti daṭṭhabbam

original: Atha vā bhagavato ñāṇassa ñeyyapariyantikattā sakalañeyyadhammasabhāvābodhanasamatthena
analyzed: atha vā bhagavataḥ ñāṇassa ñeyya pariyantika ttā sakala ñeyya dhamma sabhāva ābodhana samatthena

original: anāvaraṇañāṇasaṅkhātena paññāpajjotena sabbañeyyadhammasabhāvacchādakassa mohandhakārassa
analyzed: anāvaraṇa ñāṇa saṅkhātena paññāpajjotena sabba ñeyya dhamma sabhā avacchādakassa moha ndhakārassa

original: vidhamitattā anaññasādhāraṇo bhagavato mohatamavināsoti katvā vuttaṃ “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti.
analyzed: vidhamita ttā anañña sādhāraṇaḥ bhagavataḥ moha tama vināsaḥ ti katvā vuttam paññāpajja uta vihata moha taman ti

original: Ettha ca mohatamavidhamanante adhigatattā anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ kāraṇūpacārena sakasantāne
analyzed: ettha ca moha tama vidham anante adhigata ttā anāvaraṇa ñāṇam kāraṇa upacārena saka santāne

original: mohatamavidhamanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Abhinīhārasampattiyā savāsanappahānameva hi kilesānaṃ
analyzed: mohatama vidhamanam daṭṭhabbam abhinīhāra sampattiyā sa vāsanā pahānam eva hi kilesānam

original: “ñeyyāvaraṇappahāna”nti, parasantāne pana mohatamavidhamanassa kāraṇabhāvato anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ
analyzed: ñeyya āvaraṇa pahānam ti para santāne pana moha tama vidhamanassa kāraṇa bhāvataḥ anāvaraṇa ñāṇam

original: “mohatamavidhamana”nti vuccatīti.
analyzed: vuccati iti

original: Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ avijjāvigghāto yeveko pahānasampattivasena bhagavato thomanānimittaṃ
analyzed: kim pana kāraṇam avijjā avigghātaḥ pahāna sampatti vasena bhagavataḥ thomanā nimittam

original: gayhati, na pana sātisayaniravasesakilesappahānanti? Tappahānavacaneneva tadekaṭṭhatāya
analyzed: gayhati na pana sa atisaya niravasesa kilesa pahānan ti tad pahāna vacanena iva tad ekaṭṭhatāya

original: sakalasaṃkilesagaṇasamugghātajotitabhāvato. Na hi so tādiso kileso atthi, yo niravasesaavijjāppahānena
analyzed: sakala saṃkilesa gaṇa samugghāta jotita bhāvataḥ na hi so tādisaḥ kilesaḥ atthi yaḥ niravasesa avijjā ppahānena

original: na pahīyatīti. Atha vā vijjā viya sakalakusaladhammasamuppattiyā niravasesākusaladhammanibbattiyā,
analyzed: na pahīyati iti atha vā vijjā viya sakala kusala dhamma samuppattiyā niravasesa akusala dhamma nibbattiyā

original: saṃsārappavattiyā ca avijjā padhānakāraṇanti tabbigghātavacanena sakalasaṃkilesagaṇasamugghāto
analyzed: saṃsāra ppavattiyā ca avijjā padhāna kāraṇan ti tad bigghāta vacanena sakala saṃkilesa gaṇa samugghātaḥ

original: vuttoyeva hotīti vuttaṃ “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti.
analyzed: vuttaḥ yā iva hoti iti vuttam

original: Narā ca amarā ca narāmarā, saha narāmarehīti sanarāmaro, sanarāmaro ca so loko cāti
analyzed: narā ca amarā ca nara amarā saha nara amara ihi iti sa nara amaraḥ sa nara amaraḥ ca saḥ lokaḥ ca ati

original: sanarāmaraloko, tassa garuti sanarāmaralokagaru, taṃ sanarāmaralokagaruṃ. Etena devamanussānaṃ
analyzed: sa nara amara lokaḥ tassa garu ti sa nara amara loka garu tam sa nara amara loka garum etena deva manussānam

original: viya tadavasiṭṭhasattānampi yathārahaṃ guṇavisesāvahato bhagavato upakāritaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: viya tad avasiṭṭha sattānam pi yathāraham guṇa visesa āvahataḥ bhagavataḥ upakāri tam dasseti

original: Na cettha padhānāpadhānabhāvo codetabbo. Añño hi saddakkamo, añño atthakkamo. Edisesu
analyzed: na ca ittha padhāna apadhāna bhāvaḥ codetabbaḥ aññaḥ hi sadda kkamaḥ aññaḥ attha kkamaḥ edisesu

original: hi samāsapadesu padhānampi appadhānaṃ viya niddisīyati yathā – “sarājikāya parisāyā”ti.
analyzed: hi samāsa padesu padhānam pi appadhānam viya niddisīyati yathā sa rājikāya parisāya ati

original: Kāmañcettha sattasaṅkhārabhājanavasena tividho loko, garubhāvassa pana adhippetattā
analyzed: kāmam ca ittha satta saṅkhāra bhājana vasena tividhaḥ lokaḥ garu bhāvassa pana adhippeta ttā

original: garukaraṇasamatthasseva yujjanato sattalokassavasena attho gahetabbo. So hi lokiyanti
analyzed: garu karaṇa samatthassa iva atthaḥ gahetabbaḥ saḥ hi lokiya nti

original: ettha puññapāpāni tabbipāko cāti “loko”ti vuccati. Amaraggahaṇena cettha upapattidevā adhippetā.
analyzed: ettha puñña pāpāni tad vipāko ca ati loko ti vuccati amara ggahaṇena ca ittha upapatti devāḥ adhippetā

original: Atha vā samūhattho loka-saddo samudāyavasena lokīyati paññāpīyatīti. Saha narehīti
analyzed: atha vā samūha atthaḥ loka saddo samudāya vasena lokīyati paññāpīyati iti saha narehi iti

original: sanarā, sanarā ca te amarā ceti sanarāmarā, tesaṃ lokoti sanarāmaralokoti purimanayeneva
analyzed: sa narāḥ sa narāḥ ca te amarāḥ ca iti sa nara amarā tesam lokaḥ iti sa nara amara lokaḥ iti

original: yojetabbaṃ. Amara-saddena cettha visuddhidevāpi saṅgayhanti. Te hi maraṇābhāvato
analyzed: yojetabbam amara saddena ca ittha visuddhi devā api saṅgayhanti te hi maraṇa abhāvato

original: paramatthato amarā. Narāmarānaṃyeva ca gahaṇaṃ ukkaṭṭhaniddesavasena, yathā – “satthā

original: “kāla…pe… nidānaṃ bhāsita”nti.
analyzed: kālape nidānam

original: Apica satthusiddhiyā nidānavacanaṃ. Tathāgatassa hi bhagavato pubbaracanānumānāgamatakkābhāvato
analyzed: apica satthu siddhiyāḥ nidāna vacanam tathāgatassa hi bhagavataḥ pubba racanā anumāna āgama takka abhāvato

analyzed: appaṭihata ñāṇa cāra tāya eka ppamāṇa ttā ca ñeyya dhammesu tathā ācariya muṭṭhi dhamma macchariya satthu sāvaka anurodha abhāvato

original: khīṇāsavattasiddhi. Khīṇā savatāya hissa ācariyamuṭṭhiādīnaṃ abhāvo, visuddhā ca
analyzed: abhāvaḥ ca

original: parānuggahappavatti. Iti desakadosabhūtānaṃ diṭṭhicārittasampattidūsakānaṃ avijjātaṇhānaṃ

analyzed: abhāva sūcakehi ñāṇa ppahāna sampadā abhi byañjanakehi ca sambuddha visuddha bhāvehi

analyzed: tatas eva ca antarāyika niyyānika dhammesu sammoha abhāva siddhito pacchima vesārajja dvaya siddhi iti

analyzed: natthi niratthikā pavatti atta hita tthā vā tasmā paresam yeva atthāya pavatta sabba kiriyassa

analyzed: niravasesataḥ

original: Nidānavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: nidāna vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

analyzed: su viññeyyā hoti iti āha sutta nikkhepam vicāretvā vuccamānā pākaṭā hoti iti

original: “Suttanikkhepā”tiādīsu nikkhipanaṃ nikkhepo, suttassa nikkhepo suttassa kathanaṃ
analyzed: sutta nikkhepa ati ādīsu nikkhipanam nikkhepaḥ suttassa nikkhepaḥ suttassa kathanam

original: suttanikkhepo, suttadesanāti attho. Nikkhipīyatīti vā nikkhepo, suttaṃyeva nikkhepo

original: sā etassa atthīti aṭṭhuppattiko. Atha vā nikkhipīyati suttaṃ etenāti suttanikkhepo,

analyzed: attajjhāsayādi eva etasmin pana attha vikappe attanaḥ ajjhāsayaḥ attajjhāsayaḥ paresam

analyzed: na vā ayam kumārakaḥ mattam aññāsi itiādīsu pada pūraṇe ye hi keci bhikkhave samaṇā

analyzed: vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā iti ādīsu vikappe idha ayam vikappeya iva ati dassentaḥ āha vā saddaḥ vikappana atthaḥ ti

original: Para-saddo attheva aññatthe “ahañceva kho pana dhammaṃ deseyyaṃ, pare ca me na ājāneyyu”ntiādīsu
analyzed: para saddo attha iva aññatthe aham ca iva kho pana dhammam deseyyam pare ca me naḥ ājāneyyuṃ ti ādīsu

original: atthi adhike “indriyaparopariyattañāṇa”ntiādīsu atthi pacchābhāge “parato āgamissatī”tiādīsu.
analyzed: atthi adhike indriya para upari yatta ñāṇa nti ādīsu atthi pacchābhāge paratas āgamissati iti ādīsu

original: Atthi paccanīkabhāve “uppannaṃ parappavādaṃ saha dhammena suniggahitaṃ niggahetvā”tiādīsu.
analyzed: atthi paccanīka bhāve uppannam para ppavādam saha dhammena su niggahitam niggahetvā ati ādīsu

original: Idhāpi paccanīkabhāveti dassento āha “pareti paṭiviruddhā”ti.
analyzed: idha api paccanīka bhāvā iti dassentaḥ āha parā iti paṭiviruddhā iti

original: Īdisesupīti ettha pi-saddo sambhāvane, tena ratanattayanimittampi akusalacittappavatti
analyzed: īdisesu pi iti ettha pi saddaḥ sambhāvane tena akusala citta ppavatti

original: na kātabbā, pageva vaṭṭāmisalokāmisanimittanti dasseti. Sabhāvadhammato aññassa kattuabhāvajotanatthaṃ

analyzed: āhanati iti kattu atthe āghāta saddam dasseti tattha āhanati iti hiṃsati vibādhati upatāpeti

original: cāti attho. Āhanati etena, āhananamattaṃ vā āghātoti karaṇabhāvatthāpi sambhavantiyeva.
analyzed: ca ati etena āhanana mattam vā āghāto ti karaṇa bhāvatthā api

original: Evaṃ avayavabhedanena āghāta-saddassa atthaṃ vatvā idāni tattha pariyāyenapi atthaṃ
analyzed: evam avayava bhedanena āghāta saddassa attham vatvā idāni tattha pariyāyena api attham

analyzed: dassentaḥ kopassa itam adhivacananti āha ayañca nayaḥ appaccayaḥ anabhiraddhi iti ādīsu pi

original: yathāsambhavaṃ vattabbo. Appatītā honti tenāti pākaṭapariyāyena appaccaya-saddassa
analyzed: yathāsambhavam vattabbaḥ appatītāḥ honti tena ati pākaṭa pariyāyena appaccaya saddassa

original: atthadassanaṃ, taṃmukhena pana na pacceti tenāti appaccayoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Abhirādhayatīti
analyzed: attha dassanam taṃmukhena pana na pacceti tena ati appaccayaḥ ti daṭṭhabbam abhirādhayati iti

original: sādhayati. Dvīhīti āghātaanabhiraddhipadehi. Ekenāti appaccayapadena. Sesānanti saññāviññāṇakkhandhānaṃ,
analyzed: sādhayati dvīhi iti āghāta anabhiraddhi padehi ekena ati appaccaya padena sesānam ti saññā viññāṇa kkhandhānam

original: saññāviññāṇaavasiṭṭhasaṅkhārakkhandhasaṅkhātānaṃ vā. Karaṇanti uppādanaṃ. Āghātādīnañhi
analyzed: saññā viññāṇa avasiṭṭha saṅkhāra khandha saṅkhātānam vā karaṇam ti uppādanam āghāta ādīnam hi

original: pavattiyā paccayasamavāyanaṃ idha “karaṇa”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ pana atthato uppādanameva.

original: Uparimakāyatotiādi paṭisambhidāmagge.
Tatthāyaṃ pāḷiseso –
analyzed: tattha ayam pāḷisesaḥ

analyzed: vuttam vitthāretabbam ti ettha api satthā tiṭṭhati nimmitaḥ caṅkamati vā nisīdati

original: Madhupāyāsanti madhusittaṃ pāyāsaṃ. Attā mitto majjhatto verīti catūsu sīmasambhedavasena

analyzed: catur aṅga samannāgatam mettā kammaṭṭhānam catur aṅga samannāgatanti idam pana vīriya adhiṭṭhānam ti

analyzed: otāretvā āna apāna catuttha jjhānam ti ettha api sabba buddhānam padam vibhatti vipariṇāmam

original: kassapo bhagavā dānapāramiṃ pūretvā”tiādimāha.

original: Ettha ca suttantikānaṃ mahābodhiyānapaṭipadāya kosallajananatthaṃ pāramīsu ayaṃ vitthārakathā
analyzed: ettha ca suttantikānam mahā bodhiyāna paṭipadāya kosalla janana attham pāramīsu ayam vitthāra kathā

original: – kā panetā pāramiyo? Kenaṭṭhena pāramiyo? Katividhā cetā? Ko tāsaṃ kamo? Kāni lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānāni?
analyzed: kā pana itā pāramiyaḥ kenaṭṭhena pāramiyaḥ katividhā cetā kaḥ tāsam kamaḥ kāni lakkhaṇa rasa paccupaṭṭhāna padaṭṭhānāni

original: Ko paccayo? Ko saṃkileso? Kiṃ vodānaṃ? Ko paṭipakkho? Kā paṭipatti? Ko vibhāgo? Ko
analyzed: kaḥ paccayaḥ kaḥ saṃkilesaḥ kim vodānam kaḥ paṭipakkhaḥ kā paṭipatti kaḥ vibhāgaḥ kaḥ

original: saṅgaho? Ko sampādanūpāyo? Kittakena kālena sampādanaṃ? Ko ānisaṃso? Kiṃ cetāsaṃ phalanti?

original: Tatridaṃ vissajjanaṃ – kā panetā pāramiyoti. Taṇhāmānādīhi anupahatā karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā dānādayo guṇā pāramiyo.
analyzed: tatra idam vissajjanam kā pana itā pāramiyaḥ ti taṇhā māna ādīhi anupahatā karuṇū pāya kosalla pariggahitāḥ dāna ādayaḥ guṇāḥ pāramiyaḥ

original: Kenaṭṭhena pāramiyoti dānasīlādiguṇavisesayogena sattuttamatāya paramā mahāsattā
analyzed: kenaṭṭhena dāna sīla ādi guṇa visesa yogena sattuttamatāya paramā mahāsattā

original: bodhisattā, tesaṃ bhāvo, kammaṃ vā pāramī, dānādikiriyā. Atha vā paratīti paramo,
analyzed: bodhisattā tesam bhāvaḥ kammam vā pāramī dāna ādi kiriyā atha vā parati iti paramaḥ

original: dānādiguṇānaṃ pūrako pālako ca bodhisatto. Paramassa ayaṃ, paramassa vā bhāvo, kammaṃ

original: paraṃ vā adhikataraṃ majjati sujjhati saṃkilesamalato, paraṃ vā seṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ

analyzed: visesena gacchati param vā lokam pamāṇa bhūtena ñāṇa visesena idha lokam

original: munāti paricchindati, paraṃ vā ativiya sīlādiguṇagaṇaṃ attano santāne minoti pakkhipati,
analyzed: munāti paricchindati param vā ativiya sīla ādi guṇa gaṇam attano santāne minoti pakkhipati

original: paraṃ vā attabhūtato dhammakāyato aññaṃ, paṭipakkhaṃ vā tadanatthakaraṃ kilesacoragaṇaṃ
analyzed: param vā atta bhūtataḥ dhammakāyataḥ aññam paṭipakkham vā tad anattha karam kilesa cora gaṇam

original: mināti hiṃsatīti paramo, mahāsatto. “Paramassa aya”ntiādi vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: mināti hiṃsati iti paramaḥ mahā sattaḥ paramassa vutta nayena iva yojetabbam

original: Pāre vā nibbāne majjati sujjhati satte ca sodheti, tattha vā satte mavati bandhati
analyzed: pāre vā nibbāne majjati sujjhati satte ca sodheti tattha vā satte mavati bandhati

original: yojeti, taṃ vā mayati gacchati gameti ca, munāti vā taṃ yāthāvato, tattha vā satte
analyzed: yoja iti tam vā mayati gacchati gama iti ca munāti vā tam yāthāvato tattha vā satte

original: minoti pakkhipati, kilesāriṃ vā sattānaṃ tattha mināti hiṃsatīti pāramī, mahāpuriso.
analyzed: minoti pakkhipati kilesa arim vā sattānam tattha mināti hiṃsati iti pāramī mahā puriso

original: Tassa bhāvo, kammaṃ vā pāramitā, dānādikiriyāva. Iminā nayena pāramīnaṃ saddattho veditabbo.
analyzed: tassa bhāvaḥ kammam vā pāramitā iminā nayena saddattho veditabbo

original: Katividhāti saṅkhepato dasavidhā, tā pana pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato āgatāyeva. Yathāha –
analyzed: katividhā ati saṅkhepataḥ dasavidhā sarūpataḥ āgatāya iva yathā āha

original: “Vicinanto tadā dakkhiṃ, paṭhamaṃ dānapārami”ntiādi.
analyzed: vicinantaḥ tadā dakkhim paṭhamam dāna pāramin tiādi

original: Yathā cāha –
analyzed: yathā ca āha

original: “Kati nu kho bhante buddhakārakā dhammā? Dasa kho sāriputta buddhakārakā dhammā.
analyzed: kati nu kho bhante buddha kārakāḥ dhammāḥ dasa kho sāriputta buddha kārakāḥ dhammāḥ

original: Katame dasa? Dānaṃ kho sāriputta buddhakārako dhammo, sīlaṃ nekkhammaṃ paññā vīriyaṃ
analyzed: katame dasa dānam kho sāriputta buddha kārako dhammaḥ sīlam nekkhammam paññā vīriyam

original: khanti saccamadhiṭṭhānaṃ mettā upekkhā buddhakārako dhammo, ime kho sāriputta dasa
analyzed: khanti saccam adhiṭṭhānam mettā upekkhā buddha kārakaḥ dhammaḥ ime kho sāriputta dasa

original: buddhakārakā dhammāti. Idamavoca bhagavā, idaṃ vatvāna sugato athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā –
analyzed: buddha kārakāḥ dhammā ti idam avoca bhagavā idam vatvāna sugataḥ atha aparam etat avoca satthā

original: ‘Dānaṃ sīlañca nekkhammaṃ, paññā vīriyena pañcamaṃ;
analyzed: dānam sīlam ca nekkhammam paññā vīriyena pañcamam

original: Khanti saccaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ, mettupekkhāti te dasā’ti”.
analyzed: khanti saccam adhiṭṭhānam mettupekkhā ati te dasā ati

original: Keci pana “chabbidhā”ti vadanti, taṃ etāsaṃ saṅgahavasena vuttaṃ. So pana saṅgaho parato āvibhavissati.
analyzed: keci pana chabbidhā iti vadanti tam etāsam saṅgaha vasena vuttam saḥ pana saṅgahaḥ paratas

original: Ko tāsaṃ kamoti ettha kamo nāma desanākkamo, so ca paṭhamasamādānahetuko, samādānaṃ
analyzed: kaḥ tāsam kamo ti ettha kamaḥ nāma desanā kkamo so ca paṭhama samādāna hetuko samādānam

original: pavicayahetukaṃ, iti yathā ādimhi pavicitā samādinnā ca, tathā desitā. Tattha ca
analyzed: pavicaya hetukam iti yathā ādimhi pavicitā samādinnā ca tathā desitā tattha ca

original: dānaṃ sīlassa bahūpakāraṃ sukarañcāti taṃ ādimhi vuttaṃ. Dānaṃ sīlapariggahitaṃ mahapphalaṃ
analyzed: dānam sīlassa bahu upakāram sukaram ca ati tat ādimhi vuttam dānam sīla pariggahitam mahapphalam

original: hoti mahānisaṃsanti dānānantaraṃ sīlaṃ vuttaṃ. Sīlaṃ nekkhammapariggahitaṃ, nekkhammaṃ
analyzed: hoti mahānisaṃsanti dāna anantaram sīlam vuttam sīlam nekkhamma pariggahitam nekkhammam

original: paññāpariggahitaṃ, paññā vīriyapariggahitā, vīriyaṃ khantipariggahitaṃ, khanti saccapariggahitā,
analyzed: paññā pariggahitam paññā vīriya pariggahitā vīriyam khanti pariggahitam khanti sacca pariggahitā

original: saccaṃ adhiṭṭhānapariggahitaṃ, adhiṭṭhānaṃ mettāpariggahitaṃ, mettā upekkhāpariggahitā
analyzed: saccam adhiṭṭhāna pariggahitam adhiṭṭhānam mettā pariggahitam mettā upekkhā pariggahitā

original: mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsāti mettānantaraṃ upekkhā vuttā. Upekkhā pana karuṇāpariggahitā,
analyzed: mahapphalā hoti mahā nisaṃsā ti mettā anantaram upekkhā vuttā upekkhā pana karuṇā pariggahitā

original: karuṇā ca upekkhāpariggahitāti veditabbā. Kathaṃ pana mahākāruṇikā bodhisattā sattesu
analyzed: karuṇā ca upekkhā pariggahitā iti veditabbā katham pana mahā kāruṇikā bodhisattā sattesu

original: upekkhakā hontīti? Upekkhitabbayuttesu kañci kālaṃ upekkhakā honti, na pana sabbattha,
analyzed: upekkhakāḥ honti iti upekkhitabba yuttesu kañci kālam upekkhakāḥ honti na pana sabbattha

original: sabbadā cāti keci. Apare pana na sattesu upekkhakā, sattakatesu pana vippakāresu upekkhakā hontīti.
analyzed: sabbadā ca ati keci apare pana na sattesu upekkhakā satta katesu pana vippakāresu upekkhakā honti iti

original: Aparo nayo – pacurajanesupi pavattiyā sabbasattasādhāraṇattā, appaphalattā, sukarattā
analyzed: aparaḥ nayaḥ pacura janesu pi pavattiyā sabba satta sādhāraṇa ttā appa phala ttā sukara ttā

original: ca ādimhi dānaṃ vuttaṃ. Sīlenadāyakapaṭiggāhakasuddhito, parānuggahaṃ vatvā parapīḷānivattivacanato,
analyzed: ca ādimhi dānam vuttam sīlena dāyaka paṭiggāhaka suddhitaḥ para anuggaham vatvā para pīḷā nivatti vacanataḥ

original: kiriyadhammaṃ vatvā akiriyadhammavacanato, bhogasampattihetuṃ vatvā bhavasampattihetuvacanato
analyzed: kiriya dhammam vatvā akiriya dhamma vacanataḥ bhoga sampatti hetum vatvā bhava sampatti hetu vacanato

original: ca dānassa anantaraṃ sīlaṃ vuttaṃ. Nekkhammena sīlasampattisiddhito, kāyavacīsucaritaṃ
analyzed: ca dānassa anantaram sīlam vuttam nekkhammena sīla sampatti siddhitaḥ kāya vacī su caritam

original: vatvā manosucaritavacanato, visuddhasīlassa sukheneva jhānasamijjhanato, kammāparādhappahānena
analyzed: vatvā manaḥ su carita vacanataḥ visuddha sīlassa sukhena iva jhāna samijjhanataḥ kamma aparādha ppahānena

original: payogasuddhiṃ vatvā kilesāparādhappahānena āsayasuddhivacanato, vītikkamappahānena
analyzed: payoga suddhim vatvā kilesa aparādha pahānena āsaya suddhi vacanataḥ vītikkama ppahānena

original: cittassa pariyuṭṭhānappahānavacanato ca sīlassa anantaraṃ nekkhammaṃ vuttaṃ. Paññāya
analyzed: cittassa pariyuṭṭhāna ppahāna vacanataḥ ca sīlassa anantaram nekkhammam vuttam paññāya

original: nekkhammassa siddhiparisuddhito, jhānābhāve paññābhāvavacanato. Samādhipadaṭṭhānā
analyzed: nekkhammassa siddhi parisuddhitaḥ jhāna abhāve paññā abhāva vacanataḥ samādhi padaṭṭhānā

original: hi paññā, paññāpaccupaṭṭhāno ca samādhi. Samathanimittaṃ vatvā upekkhānimittavacanato,
analyzed: hi paññā paññā paccupaṭṭhāno ca samādhi samatha nimittam vatvā upekkhā nimitta vacanato

original: parahitajjhānena parahitakaraṇūpāyakosallavacanato ca nekkhammassa anantaraṃ paññā
analyzed: para hita jhānena para hita karaṇa upāya kosalla vacanataḥ ca nekkhammassa anantaram paññā

original: vuttā. Vīriyārambhena paññākiccasiddhito, sattasuññatādhammanijjhānakkhantiṃ vatvā
analyzed: vuttāḥ vīriya ārambhena paññā kicca siddhitaḥ satta suñña tā dhamma nijjhāna kkhantim vatvā

original: sattahitāya ārambhassa acchariyatāvacanato, upekkhānimittaṃ vatvā paggahanimittavacanato,
analyzed: satta hitāya ārambhassa acchariya tā vacanataḥ upekkhā nimittam vatvā paggaha nimitta vacanataḥ

original: nisammakāritaṃ vatvā uṭṭhānavacanato ca. Nisammakārino hi uṭṭhānaṃ phalavisesamāvahatīti
analyzed: nisammakāritam vatvā uṭṭhāna vacanato ca nisammakārinaḥ hi uṭṭhānam phala visesam āvahati iti

original: paññāya anantaraṃ vīriyaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: paññāya anantaram vīriyam vuttam

original: Vīriyena titikkhāsiddhito. Vīriyavā hi āraddhavīriyattā sattasaṅkhārehi upanītaṃ
analyzed: vīriyena titikkhā siddhitaḥ vīriyavā hi āraddha vīriya tā satta saṅkhārehi upanītam

original: dukkhaṃ abhibhuyya viharati vīriyassa titikkhālaṅkārabhāvato. Vīriyavato hi titikkhā
analyzed: dukkham abhibhuyya viharati vīriyassa titikkha alaṅkāra bhāvataḥ vīriyavataḥ hi titikkhā

original: sobhati. Paggahanimittaṃ vatvā samathanimittavacanato, accārambhena uddhaccadosappahānavacanato.
analyzed: sobhati paggaha nimittam vatvā samatha nimitta vacanataḥ acca ārambhena uddhacca dosa pahāna vacanataḥ

original: Dhammanijjhānakkhantiyā hi uddhaccadoso pahīyati. Vīriyavato sātaccakaraṇavacanato.
analyzed: dhamma nijjhāna kkhantiyā hi uddhacca doso pahīyati vīriyavataḥ sātacca karaṇa vacanataḥ

original: Khantibahulo hi anuddhato sātaccakārī hoti. Appamādavato parahitakiriyārambhe paccupakārataṇhābhāvavacanato.
analyzed: khanti bahulaḥ hi anuddhataḥ sātacca kārī hoti appamādavato para hita kiriyā ārambhe paccupakāra taṇhā bhāva vacanato

original: Yāthāvato dhammanijjhāne hi sati taṇhā na hoti. Parahitārambhe paramepi parakatadukkhasahanabhāvavacanato
analyzed: yāthāvataḥ dhamma nijjhāne hi sati taṇhā na hoti para hita ārambhe parame api para kata dukkha sahana bhāva vacanato

original: ca vīriyassa anantaraṃ khanti vuttā. Saccena khantiyā cirādhiṭṭhānato, apakārino
analyzed: ca vīriyassa anantaram khanti vuttā saccena khantiyā cira adhiṭṭhānataḥ apakārino

original: apakārakhantiṃ vatvā tadupakārakaraṇe avisaṃvādavacanato, khantiyā apavādavācāvikampanena
analyzed: apakāra khantim vatvā tad upakāra karaṇe a visaṃvāda vacanataḥ khantiyā apavāda vācā vikampanena

original: bhūtavāditāya avijahanavacanato, sattasuññatādhammanijjhānakkhantiṃ vatvā tadupabrūhitañāṇasaccavacanato
analyzed: bhūta vāditāya a vijahana vacanataḥ satta suñña tā dhamma nijjhāna kkhantim vatvā tad upabrūhita ñāṇa sacca vacanataḥ

original: ca khantiyā anantaraṃ saccaṃ vuttaṃ. Adhiṭṭhānena saccasiddhito. Acalādhiṭṭhānassa
analyzed: ca khantiyāḥ anantaram saccam vuttam adhiṭṭhānena sacca siddhitaḥ acala adhiṭṭhānassa

original: hi virati sijjhati. Avisaṃvāditaṃ vatvā tattha acalabhāvavacanato. Saccasandho hi
analyzed: hi virati sijjhati avisaṃvāditam vatvā tattha acala bhāva vacanataḥ sacca sandhaḥ hi

original: dānādīsu paṭiññānurūpaṃ niccalova pavattati. Ñāṇasaccaṃ vatvā sambhāresu pavattiniṭṭhāpanavacanato.
analyzed: dāna ādīsu paṭiññā anurūpam niccalaḥ uva pavattati ñāṇa saccam vatvā sambhāresu pavatti niṭṭhāpana vacanato

original: Yathābhūtañāṇavā hi bodhisambhāresu adhitiṭṭhati, te ca niṭṭhāpeti paṭipakkhehi akampiyabhāvatoti
analyzed: yathābhūta ñāṇavā hi bodhi sambhāresu adhitiṭṭhati te ca niṭṭhāpeti paṭipakkhehi a kampiya bhāvato ti

original: saccassa anantaraṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ. Mettāya parahitakaraṇasamādānādhiṭṭhānasiddhito,
analyzed: saccassa anantaram adhiṭṭhānam vuttam mettāya para hita karaṇa samādāna adhiṭṭhāna siddhito

original: adhiṭṭhānaṃ vatvā hitūpasaṃhāravacanato. Bodhisambhāre hi adhitiṭṭhamāno mettāvihārī
analyzed: adhiṭṭhānam vatvā hitu upasaṃhāra vacanataḥ bodhi sambhāre hi adhitiṭṭhamānaḥ mettā vihārī

original: hoti. Acalādhiṭṭhānassa samādānāvikopanato, samādānasambhavato ca adhiṭṭhānassa anantaraṃ
analyzed: hoti acala adhiṭṭhānassa samādāna avikopanataḥ samādāna sambhavataḥ ca adhiṭṭhānassa anantaram

original: mettā vuttā. Upekkhāya mettāvisuddhito, sattesu hitūpasaṃhāraṃ vatvā tadaparādhesu
analyzed: mettā vuttā upekkhāya mettā visuddhitaḥ sattesu hitu upasaṃhāram vatvā tad aparādhesu

original: udāsīnatāvacanato, mettābhāvanaṃ vatvā tannissandabhāvanāvacanato, “hitakāmasattepi
analyzed: udāsīna tā vacanataḥ mettā bhāvanam vatvā tad nissanda bhāvanā vacanataḥ hita kāma satte pi

original: upekkhako”ti acchariyaguṇabhāvavacanato ca mettāya anantaraṃ upekkhā vuttāti evametāsaṃ kamo veditabbo.
analyzed: upekkhakaḥ ti acchariya guṇa bhāva vacanataḥ ca mettāya anantaram upekkhā vuttā iti evam etāsam kamaḥ veditabbo

original: Kāni lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānānīti? Ettha avisesena tāva sabbāpi pāramiyo
analyzed: kāni lakkhaṇa rasa paccupaṭṭhāna padaṭṭhānāni iti ettha avisesena tāva sabbā api pāramiyo

original: parānuggahalakkhaṇā, paresaṃ upakārakaraṇarasā, avikampanarasā vā, hitesitāpaccupaṭṭhānā,
analyzed: para anuggaha lakkhaṇā paresam upakāra karaṇa rasā avikampana rasā vā hita īsita a paccupaṭṭhānā

original: buddhattapaccupaṭṭhānā vā, mahākaruṇāpadaṭṭhānā, karuṇūpāyakosallapadaṭṭhānā vā.
analyzed: buddha tta paccupaṭṭhānā vā mahā karuṇā pada ṭṭhānā karuṇu upāya kosalla pada ṭṭhānā vā

original: Visesena pana yasmā karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā attupakaraṇapariccāgacetanā dānapāramitā.
analyzed: visesena pana yasmai karuṇūpāya kosalla pariggahitā attu upakaraṇa pariccāga cetanā dāna pāramitā

original: Karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitaṃ kāyavacīsucaritaṃ atthato akattabbavirati, kattabbakaraṇacetanādayo
analyzed: karuṇūpāya kosalla pariggahitam kāya vacī su caritam atthataḥ akattabba virati kattabba karaṇa cetanā ādayaḥ

original: ca sīlapāramitā. Karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahito ādīnavadassanapubbaṅgamo kāmabhavehi
analyzed: ca sīla pāramitā karuṇu upāya kosalla pariggahitaḥ ādīnava dassana pubbaṅgamo kāma bhavehi

original: nikkhamanacittuppādo nekkhammapāramitā. Karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahito dhammānaṃ sāmaññavisesalakkhaṇāvabodho
analyzed: nikkhamana cittuppādaḥ nekkhamma pāramitā karuṇūpāya kosalla pariggahitaḥ dhammānam sāmañña visesa lakkhaṇa avabodho

original: paññāpāramitā. Karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahito kāyacittehi parahitārambho vīriyapāramitā.
analyzed: paññāpāramitā karuṇu upāya kosalla pariggahito kāya cittehi para hita ārambhaḥ vīriya pāramitā

original: Karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitaṃ sattasaṅkhārāparādhasahanaṃ adosappadhāno tadākārappavatto
analyzed: karuṇūpāya kosalla pariggahitam satta saṅkhāra aparādha sahanam adosa ppadhāno tad ākāra ppavatto

original: cittuppādo khantipāramitā. Karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitaṃ viraticetanādibhedaṃ avisaṃvādanaṃ
analyzed: cittuppādo khanti pāramitā karuṇū upāya kosalla pariggahitam virati cetanā ādi bhedam a visaṃvādanam

original: saccapāramitā. Karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitaṃ acalasamādānādhiṭṭhānaṃ tadākārappavatto
analyzed: sacca pāramitā karuṇūpāya kosalla pariggahitam acala samādāna adhiṭṭhānam tad ākāra ppavatto

original: cittuppādo adhiṭṭhānapāramitā. Karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahito lokassa hitūpasaṃhāro
analyzed: cittuppādaḥ adhiṭṭhāna pāramitā karuṇu upāya kosalla pariggahitaḥ lokassa hitu upasaṃhāro

original: atthato abyāpādo mettāpāramitā. Karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā anunayapaṭighaviddhaṃsinī
analyzed: atthataḥ abyāpādaḥ mettā pāramitā karuṇu upāya kosalla pariggahitā anunaya paṭigha viddhaṃsinī

original: iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu sattasaṅkhāresu samappavatti upekkhāpāramitā.
analyzed: iṭṭha aniṭṭhesu satta saṅkhāresu sama pavatti upekkhā pāramitā

original: Tasmā pariccāgalakkhaṇaṃ dānaṃ, deyyadhamme lobhaviddhaṃsanarasaṃ, anāsattipaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: tasmā pariccāga lakkhaṇam dānam deyya dhamme lobha viddhaṃsana rasam anāsatti paccupaṭṭhānam

original: bhavavibhavasampattipaccupaṭṭhānaṃ vā, pariccajitabbavatthupadaṭṭhānaṃ. Sīlanalakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: bhava vibhava sampatti paccupaṭṭhānam vā pariccajitabba vatthu padaṭṭhānam sīlana lakkhaṇam

original: sīlaṃ, samādhānalakkhaṇaṃ, patiṭṭhānalakkhaṇañcāti vuttaṃ hoti. Dussīlyaviddhaṃsanarasaṃ,
analyzed: sīlam samādhāna lakkhaṇam patiṭṭhāna lakkhaṇam ca ati vuttam hoti dussīlya viddhaṃsana rasam

original: anavajjarasaṃ vā, soceyyapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, hirottappapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Kāmato bhavato ca
analyzed: anavajja rasam vā soceyya paccupaṭṭhānam hira uttappa padaṭṭhānam kāmataḥ bhavato ca

original: nikkhamanalakkhaṇaṃ nekkhammaṃ, tadādīnavavibhāvanarasaṃ, tato eva vimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: nikkhamana lakkhaṇam nekkhammam tad ādīnava vibhāvana rasam tatas eva vimukha bhāva paccupaṭṭhānam

original: saṃvegapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Yathāsabhāvapaṭivedhalakkhaṇā paññā, akkhalitapaṭivedhalakkhaṇā
analyzed: saṃvega padaṭṭhānam yathā sabhāva paṭivedha lakkhaṇā paññā akkhalita paṭivedha lakkhaṇā

original: vā kusalissāsakhittausupaṭivedho viya, visayobhāsanarasā padīpo viya, asammohapaccupaṭṭhānā

analyzed: paramattha pāramiyaḥ ti vadanti tathā bhava sukha āvahaḥ puñña ñāṇa sambhāro pāramī attano

original: nibbānasukhāvaho upapāramī, paresaṃ tadubhayasukhāvaho paramatthapāramīti eke.
analyzed: nibbāna sukha āvahaḥ upapāramī paresam tad ubhaya sukha āvahaḥ paramattha pāramī iti eke

original: Puttadāradhanādiupakaraṇapariccāgo pana dānapāramī, attano aṅgapariccāgo dānaupapāramī,
analyzed: putta dāra dhana ādi upakaraṇa pariccāgaḥ pana dāna pāramī attanaḥ aṅga pariccāgaḥ dānaupapāramī

original: attano jīvitapariccāgo dānaparamatthapāramī. Tathā puttadārādikassa tividhassapi
analyzed: attanaḥ jīvita pariccāgaḥ dāna paramattha pāramī tathā putta dāra ādikassa tividhassa api

original: hetu avītikkamanavasena tisso sīlapāramiyo, tesu eva tividhesu vatthūsu ālayaṃ upacchinditvā
analyzed: hetu avītikkamana vasena tisso sīla pāramiyaḥ tesu eva tividhesu vatthūsu ālayam upacchinditvā

original: nikkhamanavasena tisso nekkhammapāramiyo, upakaraṇaṅgajīvitataṇhaṃ samūhanitvā sattānaṃ
analyzed: nikkhamana vasena tissaḥ nekkhamma pāramiyaḥ upakaraṇa aṅga jīvita taṇham samūhanitvā sattānam

original: hitāhitavinicchayakaraṇavasena tisso paññāpāramiyo, yathāvuttabhedānaṃ pariccāgādīnaṃ
analyzed: hita ahita vinicchaya karaṇa vasena tisso paññāpāramiyaḥ yathā vutta bhedānam pariccāga ādīnam

original: vāyamanavasena tisso vīriyapāramiyo, upakaraṇaṅgajīvitantarāyakarānaṃ khamanavasena
analyzed: vāyamana vasena tissaḥ vīriya pāramiyaḥ upakaraṇa aṅga jīvita antarāya karānam khamana vasena

original: tisso khantipāramiyo, upakaraṇaṅgajīvitahetu saccāpariccāgavasena tisso saccapāramiyo,
analyzed: tissaḥ khanti pāramiyaḥ upakaraṇa aṅga jīvita hetu sacca a pariccāga vasena tisso sacca pāramiyaḥ

original: dānādipāramiyo akuppādhiṭṭhānavaseneva samijjhantīti upakaraṇādivināsepi acalādhiṭṭhānavasena
analyzed: dāna ādi pāramiyaḥ akuppa adhiṭṭhāna vasena iva samijjhanti iti upakaraṇa ādi vināse pi acala adhiṭṭhāna vasena

original: tisso adhiṭṭhānapāramiyo, upakaraṇādiupaghātakesupi sattesu mettāya avijahanavasena
analyzed: tissaḥ adhiṭṭhāna pāramiyaḥ upakaraṇa ādi upaghātakesu pi sattesu mettāya a vijahana vasena

original: tisso mettāpāramiyo, yathāvuttavatthuttayassa upakārāpakāresu sattasaṅkhāresu majjhattatāpaṭilābhavasena
analyzed: tissaḥ mettā pāramiyaḥ yathāvutta vatthuttayassa upakāra apakāresu satta saṅkhāresu majjhatta tā paṭilābha vasena

original: tisso upekkhāpāramiyoti evamādinā etāsaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo.
analyzed: tissaḥ upekkhā pāramiyaḥ ti evamādinā etāsam vibhāgaḥ veditabbo

original: Ko saṅgahoti ettha pana yathā etā vibhāgato tiṃsavidhāpi dānapāramīādibhāvato dasavidhā,
analyzed: kaḥ saṅgahaḥ ti ettha pana yathā etāḥ vibhāgataḥ tiṃsavidhā api dānapāramī ādi bhāvataḥ dasavidhā

original: evaṃ dānasīlakhantivīriyajhānapaññāsabhāvena chabbidhā. Etāsu hi nekkhammapāramī
analyzed: evam dāna sīla khanti vīriya jhāna paññāsa bhāvena chabbidhā etāsu hi nekkhamma pāramī

original: sīlapāramiyā saṅgahitā tassā pabbajjābhāve, nīvaraṇavivekabhāve pana jhānapāramiyā,
analyzed: sīla pāramiyā saṅgahitā tassā pabbajja abhāve nīvaraṇa viveka bhāve pana jhāna pāramiyā

original: kusaladhammabhāve chahipi saṅgahitā. Saccapāramī sīlapāramiyā ekadesoyeva vacīsaccaviratisaccapakkhe,
analyzed: kusala dhamma bhāve chahi pi saṅgahitā sacca pāramī sīla pāramiyāḥ vacī sacca virati sacca pakkhe

original: ñāṇasaccapakkhe pana paññāpāramiyā saṅgahitā. Mettāpāramī jhānapāramiyā eva, upekkhāpāramī
analyzed: ñāṇa sacca pakkhe pana paññāpāramiyā saṅgahitā mettā pāramī jhāna pāramiyā eva upekkhā pāramī

original: jhānapaññāpāramīhi, adhiṭṭhānapāramī sabbāhipi saṅgahitāti.
analyzed: jhāna paññāpāramīhi adhiṭṭhāna pāramī sabbāhi pi saṅgahitā ti

original: Etesañca dānādīnaṃ channaṃ guṇānaṃ aññamaññaṃ sambandhānaṃ pañcadasayugaḷādīni pañcadasayugaḷādisādhakāni
analyzed: etesam ca dāna ādīnam channam guṇānam aññam aññam sambandhānam pañcadasa yuga ḷa ādīni pañcadasa yuga ḷa ādi sādhakāni

original: honti – seyyathidaṃ? Dānasīlayugaḷena parahitāhitānaṃ karaṇākaraṇayugaḷasiddhi, dānakhantiyugaḷena
analyzed: honti sā iyyathidam dāna sīla yugaḷena dāna khanti yugaḷena

original: alobhādosayugaḷasiddhi, dānavīriyayugaḷena cāgasutayugaḷasiddhi, dānajhānayugaḷena
analyzed: dāna vīriya yugaḷena cāga suta yugaḷa siddhi dāna jhāna yugaḷena

original: kāmadosappahānayugaḷasiddhi, dānapaññāyugaḷena ariyayānadhurayugaḷasiddhi, sīlakhantidvayena
analyzed: kāma dosa ppahāna yugaḷa siddhi dāna paññā yugaḷena ariya yāna dhura yugaḷa siddhi sīla khanti dvayena

original: payogāsayasuddhidvayasiddhi, sīlavīriyadvayena bhāvanādvayasiddhi, sīlajhānadvayena
analyzed: sīla vīriya dvayena bhāvanā dvaya siddhi sīla jhāna dvayena

original: dussīlyapariyuṭṭhānappahānadvayasiddhi, sīlapaññādvayena dānadvayasiddhi, khantivīriyayugaḷena
analyzed: dussīlya pariyuṭṭhāna ppahāna dvaya siddhi sīla paññā dvayena dāna dvaya siddhi khanti vīriya yugaḷena

original: khamātejadvayasiddhi, khantijhānayugaḷena virodhānurodhappahānayugaḷasiddhi, khantipaññāyugaḷena
analyzed: khamā teja dvaya siddhi khanti jhāna yugaḷena virodha anurodha ppahāna yugaḷa siddhi khanti paññā yugaḷena

original: suññatākhantipaṭivedhadukasiddhi, vīriyajhānadukena paggāhāvikkhepadukasiddhi, vīriyapaññādukena
analyzed: suñña tā khanti paṭivedha duka siddhi vīriya jhāna dukena paggāha avikkhepa duka siddhi vīriya paññā dukena

original: saraṇadukasiddhi, jhānapaññādukena yānadukasiddhi. Dānasīlakhantittikena lobhadosamohappahānattikasiddhi,
analyzed: saraṇa duka siddhi jhāna paññā dukena yāna duka siddhi dāna sīla khanti ttikena lobha dosa moha ppahāna ttika siddhi

original: dānasīlavīriyattikena bhogajīvitakāyasārādānattikasiddhi, dānasīlajhānattikena puññakiriyavatthuttikasiddhi,
analyzed: dāna sīla vīriya ttikena dāna sīla jhāna ttikena puñña kiriya vatthu ttika siddhi

original: dānasīlapaññātikena āmisābhayadhammadānattikasiddhīti evaṃ itarehipi tikehi catukkādīhi
analyzed: dāna sīla paññātikena āmisa abhaya dhamma dānattika siddhi iti evam itarehi pi tikehi catukka ādīhi

original: ca yathāsambhavaṃ tikāni catukkādīni ca yojetabbāni.
analyzed: ca yathāsambhavam tikāni catukka ādīni ca yojetabbāni

original: Evaṃ chabbidhānampi pana imāsaṃ pāramīnaṃ catūhi adhiṭṭhānehi saṅgaho veditabbo.
analyzed: evam chabbidhānam api pana imāsam pāramīnam catūhi adhiṭṭhānehi saṅgahaḥ veditabbo

original: Sabbapāramīnaṃ samūhasaṅgahato hi cattāri adhiṭṭhānāni. Seyyathidaṃ – saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: sabba pāramīnam samūha saṅgahato hi cattāri adhiṭṭhānāni seyyathīdam sacca adhiṭṭhānam

original: cāgādhiṭṭhānaṃ, upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ, paññādhiṭṭhānanti. Tattha adhitiṭṭhati etena,
analyzed: cāga adhiṭṭhānam upasama adhiṭṭhānam paññā adhiṭṭhānam ti tattha adhitiṭṭhati etena

original: ettha vā adhitiṭṭhati, adhiṭṭhānamattameva vā tanti adhiṭṭhānaṃ. Saccañca taṃ adhiṭṭhānañca,
analyzed: ettha vā adhitiṭṭhati adhiṭṭhāna mattam eva vā adhiṭṭhānam saccam ca tam adhiṭṭhānañca

original: saccassa vā adhiṭṭhānaṃ, saccaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ etassāti vā saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi.
analyzed: saccassa vā adhiṭṭhānam saccam adhiṭṭhānam etassa ati vā sacca adhiṭṭhānam evam sesesu pi

original: Tattha avisesato tāva lokuttaraguṇe katābhinīhārassa anukampitasabbasattassa mahāsattassa
analyzed: tattha avisesato tāva lokuttara guṇe kata abhinīhārassa anukampita sabba sattassa mahāsattassa

original: pariññānurūpaṃ sabbapāramipariggahato saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ, tesaṃ paṭipakkhapariccāgato
analyzed: pariññā anurūpam sabba pārami pariggahato sacca adhiṭṭhānam tesam paṭipakkha pariccāgato

original: cāgādhiṭṭhānaṃ, sabbapāramitāguṇehi upasamato upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ, tehiyeva parahitopāyakosallato
analyzed: cāga adhiṭṭhānam sabba pāramitā guṇehi upasamataḥ upasama adhiṭṭhānam tehi yeva para hita upāya kosallato

original: paññādhiṭṭhānaṃ. Visesato pana “atthikajanaṃ avisaṃvādetvā dassāmī”ti paṭijānato,
analyzed: paññā adhiṭṭhānam visesato pana atthika janam a visaṃvādetvā dassāmi iti paṭijānato

original: paṭiññaṃ avisaṃvādetvā dānato, dānaṃ avisaṃvādetvā anumodanato, macchariyādipaṭipakkhapariccāgato,
analyzed: paṭiññam a visaṃvādetvā dānataḥ dānam a visaṃvādetvā anumodanataḥ macchariya ādi paṭipakkha pariccāgato

original: deyyapaṭiggāhakadānadeyyadhammakkhayesu lobhadosamohabhayavūpasamato, yathārahaṃ
analyzed: deyya paṭiggāhaka dāna deyya dhamma kkhayesu lobha dosa moha bhaya vūpasamataḥ yathāraham

original: yathākālaṃ yathāvidhānañca dānato, paññuttarato ca kusaladhammānaṃ caturadhiṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: yathākālam yathā vidhānam ca dānataḥ paññuttarataḥ ca kusala dhammānam catur adhiṭṭhāna padaṭṭhānam

original: dānaṃ. Tathā saṃvarasamādānassa avītikkamato, dussīlyapariccāgato, duccaritavūpasamato,
analyzed: dānam tathā saṃvara samādānassa a vītikkamataḥ dussīlya pariccāgataḥ duccarita vūpasamataḥ

original: paññuttarato ca caturadhiṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ sīlaṃ. Yathāpaṭiññaṃ khamanato, parāparādhavikappapariccāgato,
analyzed: paññuttarato ca catur adhiṭṭhāna padaṭṭhānam sīlam yathāpaṭiññam khamanataḥ para aparādha vikappa pariccāgato

original: kodhapariyuṭṭhānavūpasamato, paññuttarato ca caturadhiṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānā khanti. Paṭiññānurūpaṃ
analyzed: kodha pariyuṭṭhāna vūpasamataḥ paññuttarataḥ ca catur adhiṭṭhāna padaṭṭhānā khanti paṭiññā anurūpam

original: parahitakaraṇato, visādapariccāgato, akusaladhammānaṃ vūpasamato, paññuttarato ca
analyzed: para hita karaṇataḥ visāda pariccāgataḥ akusala dhammānam vūpasamataḥ paññuttarataḥ ca

original: caturadhiṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ vīriyaṃ. Paṭiññānurūpaṃ lokahitānucintanato, nīvaraṇapariccāgato,
analyzed: catur adhiṭṭhāna padaṭṭhānam vīriyam paṭiññā anurūpam loka hita anucintanataḥ nīvaraṇa pariccāgato

original: cittavūpasamato, paññuttarato ca caturadhiṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ jhānaṃ. Yathāpaṭiññaṃ
analyzed: citta vūpasamataḥ paññuttarataḥ ca catur adhiṭṭhāna padaṭṭhānam jhānam yathāpaṭiññam

original: parahitūpāyakosallato, anupāyakiriyāpariccāgato, mohajapariḷāhavūpasamato, sabbaññutāpaṭilābhato
analyzed: para hitu upāya kosallataḥ an upāya kiriyā pariccāgataḥ moha ja pariḷāha vūpasamataḥ sabbaññu tā paṭilābhato

original: ca caturadhiṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānā paññā.
analyzed: ca catur adhiṭṭhāna padaṭṭhānā paññā

original: Tattha ñeyyapaṭiññānuvidhānehi saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ, vatthukāmakilesakāmapariccāgehi cāgādhiṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: tattha ñeyya paṭiññā anuvidhānehi sacca adhiṭṭhānam vatthu kāma kilesa kāma pariccāgehi cāga adhiṭṭhānam

original: dosadukkhavūpasamehi upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ, anubodhapaṭivedhehi paññādhiṭṭhānaṃ. Tividhasaccapariggahitaṃ
analyzed: dosa dukkha vūpasamehi upasama adhiṭṭhānam anubodha paṭivedhehi paññā adhiṭṭhānam tividha sacca pariggahitam

original: dosattayavirodhi saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ, tividhacāgapariggahitaṃ dosattayavirodhi cāgādhiṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: dosa ttaya virodhi sacca adhiṭṭhānam tividha cāga pariggahitam dosa ttaya virodhi cāga adhiṭṭhānam

original: tividhavūpasamapariggahitaṃ dosattayavirodhi upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ, tividhañāṇapariggahitaṃ
analyzed: tividha vūpasama pariggahitam dosa ttaya virodhi upasama adhiṭṭhānam tividha ñāṇa pariggahitam

original: dosattayavirodhi paññādhiṭṭhānaṃ. Saccādhiṭṭhānapariggahitāni cāgūpasamapaññādhiṭṭhānāni
analyzed: dosa ttaya virodhi paññā adhiṭṭhānam sacca adhiṭṭhāna pariggahitāni ca agūpasama paññā adhiṭṭhānāni

original: avisaṃvādanato, paṭiññānuvidhānato ca. Cāgādhiṭṭhānapariggahitāni saccūpasamapaññādhiṭṭhānāni
analyzed: a visaṃvādanato paṭiññā anuvidhānato ca cāga adhiṭṭhāna pariggahitāni sacca upasama paññā adhiṭṭhānāni

original: paṭipakkhapariccāgato, sabbapariccāgaphalattā ca. Upasamādhiṭṭhānapariggahitāni saccacāgapaññādhiṭṭhānāni
analyzed: paṭipakkha pariccāgataḥ sabba pariccāga phala ttā ca upasama adhiṭṭhāna pariggahitāni sacca cāga paññā adhiṭṭhānāni

original: kilesapariḷāhūpasamato, kāmūpasamato, kāmapariḷāhūpasamato ca. Paññādhiṭṭhānapariggahitāni
analyzed: kilesa pariḷāha upasamato kāma upasamato kāma pariḷāha upasamato ca paññā adhiṭṭhāna pariggahitāni

original: saccacāgūpasamādhiṭṭhānāni ñāṇapubbaṅgamato, ñāṇānuparivattanato cāti evaṃ sabbāpi
analyzed: sacca cāga upasama adhiṭṭhānāni ñāṇa pubbaṅgamataḥ ñāṇa anuparivattanato ca ati evam sabbā api

original: pāramiyo saccappabhāvitā cāgaparibyañjitā upasamopabrūhitā paññāparisuddhā. Saccañhi
analyzed: pāramiyaḥ sacca ppabhāvitā cāga paribyañjitā upasamopabrūhitā paññā parisuddhā

original: etāsaṃ janakahetu, cāgo pariggāhakahetu, upasamo parivuḍḍhihetu, paññā pārisuddhihetu.
analyzed: etāsam janaka hetu cāgaḥ pariggāhaka hetu upasamaḥ parivuḍḍhi hetu paññā pārisuddhi hetu

original: Tathā ādimhi saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccapaṭiññattā, majjhe cāgādhiṭṭhānaṃ katapaṇidhānassa
analyzed: tathā ādimhi sacca adhiṭṭhānam sacca paṭiññattā majjhe cāga adhiṭṭhānam kata paṇidhānassa

original: parahitāya attapariccāgato, ante upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ sabbūpasamapariyosānattā, ādimajjhapariyosānesu
analyzed: para hitāya atta pariccāgato ante upasama adhiṭṭhānam sabba upasama pariyosāna ttā ādi majjha pariyosānesu

original: paññādhiṭṭhānaṃ tasmiṃ sati sambhavato, asati abhāvato, yathāpaṭiññañca bhāvato.
analyzed: paññā adhiṭṭhānam tasmin sati sambhavataḥ asati abhāvataḥ yathāpaṭiññam ca bhāvato

original: Tattha mahāpurisā attahitaparahitakarehi garupiyabhāvakarehi saccacāgādhiṭṭhānehi
analyzed: tattha mahā purisāḥ atta hita para hita karehi garupiya bhāva karehi sacca cāga adhiṭṭhānehi

original: gihibhūtā āmisadānena pare anuggaṇhanti. Tathā attahitaparahitakarehi garupiyabhāvakarehi
analyzed: gihi bhūtāḥ āmisa dānena pare anuggaṇhanti tathā atta hita para hita karehi garupiya bhāva karehi

original: upasamapaññādhiṭṭhānehi ca pabbajitabhūtā dhammadānena pare anuggaṇhanti.
analyzed: upasama paññā adhiṭṭhānehi ca pabbajita bhūtāḥ dhamma dānena pare anuggaṇhanti

original: Tattha antimabhave bodhisattassa caturadhiṭṭhānaparipūraṇaṃ. Paripuṇṇacaturadhiṭṭhānassa
analyzed: tattha antima bhave bodhisattassa catur adhiṭṭhāna paripūraṇam paripuṇṇa catur adhiṭṭhānassa

original: hi carimakabhavūpapattīti eke. Tatra hi gabbhokkantiṭhitiabhinikkhamanesu paññādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena
analyzed: hi carimaka bhava upapatti iti eke tatra hi gabbha ukkanti ṭhiti abhinikkhamanesu paññā adhiṭṭhāna samudāgamena

original: sato sampajāno saccādhiṭṭhānapāripūriyā sampatijāto uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena
analyzed: sataḥ sampajāno sacca adhiṭṭhāna pāripūriyā sampatijātaḥ uttara abhimukhaḥ satta padavī tihārena

original: gantvā sabbā disā oloketvā saccānuparivattinā vacasā “aggohamasmi lokassa, jeṭṭho…pe…
analyzed: gantvā sabbāḥ disāḥ oloketvā sacca anuparivattinā vacasā aggo ham asmi lokassa jeṭṭhope

original: seṭṭhohamasmi lokassā”ti tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ nadi, upasamādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena
analyzed: seṭṭhaḥ ham asmi lokassa ati tikkhattum sīhanādam nadi upasama adhiṭṭhāna samudāgamena

original: jiṇṇāturamatapabbajitadassāvino catudhammapadesakovidassa yobbanārogyajīvitasampattimadānaṃ
analyzed: jiṇṇa ātura mata pabbajita dassāvino catu dhamma padesa kovidassa yobbana ārogya jīvita sampatti madānam

original: upasamo, cāgādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena mahato ñātiparivaṭṭassa hatthagatassa ca cakkavattirajjassa
analyzed: upasamaḥ cāga adhiṭṭhāna samudāgamena mahataḥ ñāti parivaṭṭassa hattha gatassa ca cakkavatti rajjassa

original: anapekkhapariccāgoti.
analyzed: an apekkha pariccāgaḥ ti

original: pañcasambhāravinimuttā daṭṭhabbā. Vijjāmayo mantaparijappanapayogo āthabbaṇikādīnaṃ
analyzed: pañca sambhāra vinimuttāḥ daṭṭhabbāḥ vijjā āmayaḥ manta parijappana payogaḥ āthabbaṇika ādīnam

original: viya. Iddhimayo kammavipākajiddhimayo dāṭhākoṭakādīnaṃ viya. Ativiya papañcoti atimahāvitthāro.
analyzed: viya iddhi mayo kamma vipāka jiddhi mayo dāṭhā koṭaka ādīnam ati viya papañcoti ati mahā vitthāro

original: Etthāha – khaṇe khaṇe nirujjhanasabhāvesu saṅkhāresu ko hanti, ko vā haññati, yadi
analyzed: ettha āha khaṇe khaṇe nirujjhana sabhāvesu saṅkhāresu kaḥ hanti kaḥ vā haññati yadi

original: cittacetasikasantāno, so arūpatāya na chedanabhedanādivasena vikopanasamattho, nāpi
analyzed: citta cetasika santāno saḥ arūpa tāya na chedana bhedana ādi vasena vikopana samatthaḥ na api

original: vikopanīyo, atha rūpasantāno, so acetanatāya kaṭṭhakaliṅgarūpamoti na tattha chedanādinā
analyzed: vikopanīyaḥ atha rūpa santāno so acetana tāya na tattha chedana ādinā

original: pāṇātipāto labbhati yathā matasarīre, payogopi pāṇātipātassa paharaṇappakārādi atītesu
analyzed: pāṇātipātaḥ labbhati yathā mata sarīre payogaḥ api pāṇātipātassa paharaṇa ppakāra ādi atītesu

original: vā saṅkhāresu bhaveyya anāgatesu vā paccuppannesu vā, tattha na tāva atītānāgatesu
analyzed: vā saṅkhāresu bhaveyya anāgatesu vā paccuppannesu vā tattha na tāva atīta anāgatesu

original: sambhavati tesaṃ abhāvato, paccuppannesu ca saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikattā saraseneva nirujjhanasabhāvatāya
analyzed: sambhavati tesam abhāvato paccuppannesu ca saṅkhārānam khaṇika ttā sarasena iva nirujjhana sabhāva tāya

original: vināsābhimukhesu nippayojano payogo siyā, vināsassa ca kāraṇarahitattā na paharaṇappakārādipayogahetukaṃ
analyzed: vināsa abhimukhesu nippayojanaḥ payogaḥ siyā vināsassa ca kāraṇa rahita ttā na paharaṇa ppakāra ādi payoga hetukam

original: maraṇaṃ, nirīhakatāya ca saṅkhārānaṃ kassa so payogo, khaṇikattā vadhādhippāyasamakālabhijjanakassa
analyzed: maraṇam nirīhaka tāya ca saṅkhārānam kassa so payogaḥ khaṇika ttā vadha adhippāya sama kāla bhijjanakassa

original: kiriyāpariyosānakālānavaṭṭhānato kassa vā pāṇātipātakammabaddhoti.
analyzed: kiriyā pariyosāna kāla an avaṭṭhānato kassa vā pāṇātipāta kamma baddho ti

original: Vuccate – yathāvuttavadhakacetanāsahito saṅkhārānaṃ puñjo sattasaṅkhāto hantā, tena

original: pavattitavadhakapayoganimittaṃ apagatusmāviññāṇajīvitindriyo matavohārappavattinibandho
analyzed: pavattita vadhaka payoga nimittam mata vohāra ppavatti nibandho

original: yathāvuttavadhappayogākaraṇe uppajjanāraho rūpārūpadhammasamūho haññati, kevalo vā

original: cittacetasikasantāno. Vadhappayogāvisayabhāvepi tassa pañcavokārabhave rūpasantānādhīnavuttitāya
analyzed: citta cetasika santānaḥ vadha payoga a visaya bhāve pi tassa pañcavokāra bhave rūpa santāna adhīna vutti tāya

original: rūpasantāne parena payojitajīvitindriyupacchedakapayogavasena tannibbattivibandhakavisadisarūpuppattiyā

analyzed: payogaḥ nippayojanaḥ paccuppannesu saṅkhāresu kata payoga vasena tad anantaram uppajjanā rahassa

original: maraṇabhāvena anadhippetattā, santatimaraṇassa ca yathāvuttanayena sahetukabhāvato

analyzed: yathā padīpaḥ pakāseti nisākaro ca na ca kevalassa vadha adhippāya sahabhuno

original: santānavasena pavattamānānañca padīpādīnaṃ atthakiriyāsiddhi dissatīti attheva pāṇātipātena

original: kammabaddho. Ayañca vicāro adinnādānādīsupi yathāsambhavaṃ vibhāvetabbo.
analyzed: kamma baddhaḥ ayam ca vicāraḥ adinnādāna ādīsu pi yathāsambhavam vibhāvetabbaḥ

original: “Pahīnakālato paṭṭhāya viratovā”ti etena pahānahetukā idhādhippetā samucchedaviratīti
analyzed: pahīna kālataḥ paṭṭhāya viratā uvāti etena pahāna hetukā idha adhippetā samuccheda virati iti

original: dasseti. Kammakkhayañāṇena hi pāṇātipātadussīlyassa pahīnattā bhagavā accantameva
analyzed: dasseti kamma kkhaya ñāṇena hi pāṇātipāta dussīlyassa pahīna ttā bhagavā accantam eva

original: tato paṭiviratoti vuccati samucchedavasena pahānaviratīnaṃ adhippetattā. Kiñcāpi
analyzed: tatas paṭivirataḥ ti vuccati samuccheda vasena pahāna viratīnam adhippeta ttā kiñcā api

analyzed: sammāvācā ādīnam ca paccaya paccaya uppanna bhāve apekkhite sahajātānam pi paccaya paccaya uppanna bhāvena

analyzed: gahaṇam purima pacchima bhāvena iva hoti iti gahaṇa ppavatti ākāra vasena paccaya bhūtesu sammādiṭṭhi ādīsu

original: virati paṭippassaddhivasena yojetabbā. Atha vā pāṇo atipātīyati etenāti pāṇātipāto,

original: pāṇaghātahetubhūto dhammasamūho. Ko paneso? Ahirikānottappadosamohavihiṃsādayo kilesā.

analyzed: te hi bhagavā ariya maggena pahāya samugghāṭetvā pāṇa atipāta dussīlyataḥ accantam eva

original: paṭiviratoti vuccati kilesesu pahīnesu kilesanimittassa kammassa anuppajjanato. “Adinnādānaṃ

original: pahāyā”tiādīsupi eseva nayo. Viratovāti avadhāraṇena tassā viratiyā kālādivasena
analyzed: pahāya ati ādīsu pi esā iva nayaḥ avadhāraṇena tassā viratiyā kāla ādi vasena

analyzed: samādānam bhindanti na evam bhagavā bhagavā pana sabbaso pahīna pāṇa atipāta ttā accanta virataḥ

original: evāti. Vītikkamissāmīti anavajjadhammehi vokiṇṇā antarantarā uppajjanakā dubbalākusalā.

original: balavākusale sandhāyāha.
analyzed: balavākusale sandhāya āha

original: Gottavasena laddhavohāroti sambandho. Dīpetuṃ vaṭṭati brahmadattena bhāsitavaṇṇassa

analyzed: paṭṭhāya evam āgatā ati

analyzed: daṇḍana saṅkhātassa daṇḍassa para viheṭhanassa vivajjita bhāva dīpana attham daṇḍa satthānam

analyzed: nikkhepa vacananti āha para upaghāta atthāya atiādi viheṭhana bhāvataḥ ti vihiṃsana bhāvataḥ

original: Lajjīti ettha vuttalajjāya ottappampi vuttamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi pāpajigucchanaṃ

analyzed: dayam āpannaḥ ti kasmā vuttam nanu dayā saddaḥ dayā pannaḥ ti ādīsu karuṇāya

analyzed: pavattati iti saccam etam ayam pana dayā saddaḥ anurakkhaṇam attham antonītam katvā

original: siniyhatīti mettā, mettā etassa atthīti mettaṃ, mettaṃ cittaṃ etassāti mettacitto,

analyzed: karuṇāyanakaḥ yasmā pana mettā karuṇāya visesa paccayaḥ hoti tasmā vuttam tāya eva

original: dayāpannatāyā”ti. Evaṃ yehi dhammehi pāṇātipātā virati sampajjati, tehi lajjāmettākaruṇāhi

analyzed: cañcalam na magga phala sukham viya eka rūpena avatiṭṭhati iti tena iva āha

original: “paritassitenā”tiādi.
analyzed: paritassitena ati ādi

analyzed: catudhā paccayaḥ dukkhā ca ārammaṇa matta pakatu upanissaya vasena dvidhā ati saccam etam

analyzed: upanissaya koṭiyā iti vuttam na upanissayena ati

analyzed: kāma upādānam ti saccam etam tattha dubbalā taṇhā balavatī taṇhā kāma upādānam

original: Atha vā appattavisayapatthanā taṇhā tamasi corānaṃ karapasāraṇaṃ viya. Sampattavisayaggahaṇaṃ

original: Upādānassāti asahajātassa upādānassa upanissayakoṭiyā, itarassa sahajātakoṭiyāti

analyzed: anānantarassa upanissayena ārammaṇa bhūtā pana ārammaṇa adhipati ārammaṇa upanissayehi

original: ārammaṇamatteneva vāti taṃ sabbaṃ upanissayeneva gahetvā “upanissayakoṭiyā”ti vuttaṃ.

original: Yasmā ca taṇhāya rūpādīni assādetvā kāmesu pātabyataṃ āpajjati, tasmā taṇhā kāmupādānassa

analyzed: muccitu kāmaḥ a suddhi magge suddhi magga parāmasanam khandhesu atta tta niya gāha bhūtam

original: sakkāyadassanaṃ gaṇhāti, tasmā itaresampi taṇhā upanissayoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sahajātassa
analyzed: sa kāya dassanam gaṇhāti tasmai itaresam pi taṇhā upanissayaḥ ti daṭṭhabbam sahajātassa

original: pana sahajātaaññamaññanissayasampayuttaatthiavigatahetuvasena taṇhā paccayo hoti.

original: Taṃ sabbaṃ sandhāya “sahajātakoṭiyā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: tam sabbam sandhāya sahajāta koṭiyā iti vuttam

original: Tathāti upanissayakoṭiyā ceva sahajātakoṭiyā cāti attho. Bhavassāti kammabhavassa
analyzed: tathā ti upanissaya koṭiyā ca iva sahajāta koṭiyā ca ati atthaḥ bhavassa āti kamma bhavassa

original: ceva upapattibhavassa ca. Tattha cetanādisaṅkhā taṃ sabbaṃ bhavagāmikammaṃ kammabhavo,
analyzed: upapatti bhavassa ca tattha cetanā ādi saṅkhā tam sabbam bhava gāmi kammam kamma bhavaḥ

original: kāmabhavādiko navavidho upapattibhavo, tesaṃ upapattibhavassa catubbidhampi upādānaṃ

original: upapattibhavakāraṇakammabhavakāraṇabhāvato, tassa ca sahāyabhāvūpagamanato pakatūpanissayavasena

analyzed: paccayaḥ hoti kamma ārammaṇa karaṇa kāle pana kamma sahajāta kāma upādānam upapatti bhavassa

original: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo hoti. Kammabhavassa pana sahajātassa sahajātaṃ upādānaṃ
analyzed: ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ hoti kamma bhavassa pana sahajātassa sahajātam upādānam

original: sahajātaaññamaññanissayasampayuttaatthiavigatavasena ceva hetumaggavasena ca anekadhā
analyzed: sahajāta aññamañña nissaya sampayutta atthi avigata vasena ca iva hetu magga vasena ca anekadhā

original: paccayo hoti, asahajātassa anantarasamanantaraanantarūpanissayanatthivigatāsevanavasena,
analyzed: paccayaḥ hoti asahajātassa anantara samanantara ananta rūpa nissaya natthi vigata āsevana vasena

original: itarassa pakatūpanissayavasena, sammasanādikālesu ārammaṇavasena ca paccayo hoti.
analyzed: itarassa pakatūpanissaya vasena sammasana ādi kālesu ārammaṇa vasena ca paccayaḥ hoti

original: Tattha anantarādike upanissayapaccaye, sahajātādike sahajātapaccaye pakkhipitvā vuttaṃ
analyzed: tattha anantara ādike upanissaya paccaye sahajāta ādike sahajāta paccaye pakkhipitvā vuttam

original: “upanissayakoṭiyā ceva sahajātakoṭiyā cā”ti.

original: pariyāyavacanaṃ. “Tumhehi vo bhavantehī”ti pariyāyavacanaṃ. “Āghāto doso byāpādo”ti
analyzed: pariyāya vacanam tumhehi vaḥ bhavantehi iti pariyāya vacanam āghātaḥ dosaḥ

original: pariyāyavacanaṃ. “Appaccayo domanassaṃ cetasikadukkha”nti pariyāyavacanaṃ. “Cetaso
analyzed: pariyāya vacanam appaccayaḥ domanassam cetasika dukkhan ti pariyāya vacanam cetasaḥ

original: anabhiraddhi cittassa byāpatti manopadoso”ti pariyāyavacanaṃ. “Na karaṇīyā na uppādetabbā
analyzed: cittassa byāpatti manaḥ upadoso ti pariyāya vacanam na karaṇīyā na uppādetabbā

original: Paññattihāravaṇṇanā
analyzed: paññatti hāra vaṇṇanā

original: Āghāto vatthuvasena dasavidhena ekūnavīsatividhena vā paññatto. Appaccayo upavicāravasena

analyzed: chadhā paññattā tathā jarā sattadhā paññattā maraṇam aṭṭhadhā navadhā ca paññattam

original: Soko pañcadhā paññatto. Paridevo chadhā paññatto. Dukkhaṃ catudhā paññattaṃ, tathā
analyzed: sokaḥ pañcadhā paññatto paridevaḥ chadhā paññattaḥ dukkham catudhā paññattam tathā

analyzed: domanassam upāyāso catudhā paññatto samudayaḥ hoti iti pabhava paññatti yathābhūtam

analyzed: maggassa bhāvanā paññatti

analyzed: parinibbāna paññatti evam āghāta ādīnam akusala kusala ādi dhammānam yathā apabhava paññatti ādi vasena

original: nayena paññattibhedo vibhajitabboti ayaṃ paññattihāro.

original: Otaraṇahāravaṇṇanā
analyzed: otaraṇa hāra vaṇṇanā

original: adhipativasena, koci kammavasena, koci āhāravasena, koci indriyavasena, koci jhānavasena,

original: purimanayeneva khandhādimukhena ca otaraṇaṃ vibhāvetabbaṃ. Esa nayo ñāṇadiṭṭhivedanāavijjātaṇhādiggahaṇesu.

original: Sodhanahāravaṇṇanā
analyzed: sodhana hāra vaṇṇanā

analyzed: idam kho ti ādi pucchā suddhi ca iva pada suddhi ca ārambha suddhi ca

original: Tathā “atthi bhikkhave”tiādi ārambho. “Katame ca te”tiādi pucchā. “Santi bhikkhave”tiādi
analyzed: tathā atthi bhikkhave itiādi ārambhaḥ katame ca te tiādi pucchā santi bhikkhave itiādi

analyzed: ārambho kintiādi ārambha pucchā yathā samāhita itiādi pada suddhi no ārambha suddhi

original: no ca pucchāsuddhi. “Ime kho te”tiādi padasuddhi ceva pucchāsuddhi ca ārambhasuddhi
analyzed: no ca pucchā suddhi ime kho te tiādi pada suddhi ca iva pucchā suddhi ca ārambha suddhi

original: Tathā “pubbantakappikā”tiādi sāmaññato adhiṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ avikappetvā visesavacanaṃ “sassatavādā”tiādi. Iminā nayena sabbattha sāmaññaviseso niddhāretabboti ayaṃ adhiṭṭhāno hāro.

analyzed: parikkhāra hāra vaṇṇanā

analyzed: āghāta ādīnam anattham me acari iti ādīni ca ekūnavīsati āghāta vatthūni hetu ānanda ādīnam

analyzed: ca hetu anupādā vimuttiyāḥ ariya maggo hetu paññāpanassa a yoniso manasikāraḥ hetu taṇhāya

analyzed: saṃyojaniyesu assāda anupassanā hetu phassassa chaḍāyatanāni chaḍāyatanassa nāma rūpaṃ

analyzed: samāropana hāra vaṇṇanā

original: Ārammaṇaṃ bhāyati etasmāti bhayaṃ. Otappaṃ pāpato bhāyati etenāti bhayaṃ. Bhayānakanti

original: bhāyanākāro. Bhayanti ñāṇabhayaṃ. Saṃveganti sahottappañāṇaṃ santāsanti sabbaso ubbijjanaṃ.
analyzed: bhāyana ākāraḥ bhayanti ñāṇa bhayam saṃveganti saha uttappa ñāṇam santāsanti sabbasas ubbijjanam

original: Bhāyitabbaṭṭhena bhayaṃ bhīmabhāvena bheravanti bhayabheravaṃ, bhītabbavatthu. Tenāha “āgacchatī”ti.
analyzed: bhāyitabba aṭṭhena bhayam bhīma bhāvena bheravanti bhaya bheravam bhītabba vatthu tena āha āgacchati iti

original: Bhīruṃ pasaṃsantīti pāpato bhāyanato uttasanato bhīruṃ pasaṃsanti paṇḍitā. Na hi
analyzed: bhīrum pasaṃsanti iti pāpataḥ bhāyanataḥ uttasanataḥ bhīrum pasaṃsanti paṇḍitāḥ na hi

original: tattha sūranti tasmiṃ pāpakaraṇe sūraṃ pagabbhadhaṃsinaṃ na hi pasaṃsanti. Tenāha
analyzed: tattha sūram ti tasmin pāpa karaṇe sūram pagabbha dhaṃsinam na hi pasaṃsanti tena āha

original: “bhayā hi santo na karonti pāpa”nti. Tattha bhayāti pāputrāsato, ottappahetūti attho.
analyzed: bhayā hi santaḥ na karonti pāpanti tattha bhayā ati ottappa hetū ti attho

original: Sarīracalananti bhayavasenasarīrasaṃkampo. Eketi uttaravihāravāsino. “Rājagahe”tiādi
analyzed: eka iti uttara vihāra vāsinaḥ rāja gaha iti ādi

original: tesaṃ adhippāyavivaraṇaṃ. Kāmaṃ vayatulyo “vayasso”ti vuccati, rūḷhireso, yo koci
analyzed: tesam adhippāya vivaraṇam kāmam vaya tulyaḥ vayassaḥ ti vuccati rūḷhi resaḥ yaḥ koci

original: pana sahāyo vayasso, tasmā vayassābhilāpoti sahāyābhilāpo. Na vippalambhesīti na
analyzed: pana sahāyaḥ vayasso tasmai sahāya abhilāpo ti na

original: visaṃvādesi. Vinasseyyāti cittavighātena vihaññeyya.
analyzed: visaṃvādesi vinasseyya ati citta vighātena vihaññeyya

original: Sāmaññaphalapucchāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: sāmañña phala pucchā vaṇṇanā

original: 160. Bhagavato tejoti buddhānubhāvo. Rañño sarīraṃ phari yathā taṃ soṇadaṇḍassa brāhmaṇassa bhagavato santikaṃ gacchantassa antovanasaṇḍagatassa. Eketi uttaravihāravāsino.
analyzed: bhagavato tejaḥ ti buddha anubhāvaḥ raññaḥ sarīram yathā tam soṇadaṇḍassa brāhmaṇassa bhagavato santikam gacchantassa antar vana saṇḍa gatassa eke iti uttara vihāra vāsinaḥ

original: 161. Yena, tenāti ca bhummatthe karaṇavacananti āha “yattha bhagavā, tattha gato”ti.
analyzed: yena tena ati ca bhumma tthe karaṇa vacananti āha yattha bhagavā tattha gataḥ iti

original: Tadā tasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe tuṇhībhāvassa anavasesato byāpibhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “tuṇhībhūtaṃ
analyzed: tadā tasmin bhikkhu saṅghe tuṇhībhāvassa anavasesataḥ byāpi bhāvam dassetum tuṇhībhūtam

original: tuṇhībhūta”nti vuttanti āha “yato yato…pe… mevāti attho”ti. Hatthassa kukatattā asaṃyamo
analyzed: tuṇhībhūtanti vuttanti āha yatas mā iva ati atthaḥ ti hatthassa kukata ttā asaṃyamaḥ

original: asampajaññakiriyā hatthakukkuccanti veditabbo. Vā-saddo avuttavikappattho, tena tadañño
analyzed: asampajañña kiriyā hatthakukkuccanti veditabbaḥ vā saddaḥ a vutta vikappa atthaḥ tena tad aññaḥ

original: asaṃyamabhāvo vibhāvitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tattha pana cakkhuasaṃyamo sabbapaṭhamo, dunnivāro
analyzed: asaṃyama bhāvaḥ vibhāvito ti daṭṭhabbam tattha pana cakkhu asaṃyamo sabba paṭhamaḥ dunnivāro

original: cāti tadabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍita”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Kāyikavācasikena
analyzed: ca ati tad abhāvam dassetum sabba alaṅkāra paṭimaṇḍita ntiādi vuttam kāyika vācasikena

original: upasamena laddhena itaropi anumānato laddho eva hotīti āha “mānasikena cā”ti. Upasamanti
analyzed: upasamena laddhena itaraḥ api anumānataḥ laddhaḥ eva hoti iti āha mānasikena ca ati

original: saṃyamaṃ, ācārasampattinti attho. Pañcaparivaṭṭeti pañcapurisaparivaṭṭe. Pañcahākārehīti
analyzed: saṃyamam ācāra sampattinti attho pañca parivaṭṭe iti pañca purisa parivaṭṭe pañca hākārehi iti

original: “iṭṭhāniṭṭhe tādī”ti evaṃ ādinā āgatehi, pañcavidhaariyiddhisiddhehi ca pañcahi pakārehi.
analyzed: iṭṭha aniṭṭhe ta ādi iti evam ādinā āgatehi pañcavidha ariyiddhi siddhehi ca pañcahi pakārehi

original: Tādilakkhaṇeti tādibhāve.
analyzed: tādi lakkhaṇā iti ta ādi bhāve

original: 162. Na me pañhavissajjane bhāro atthīti satthu sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇacāratādassanaṃ.
analyzed: na me pañha vissajjane bhāraḥ atthi iti satthu sabbattha appaṭihata ñāṇa cāra tā dassanam

original: Yadākaṅkhasīti na vadanti, kathaṃ pana vadantīti āha “sutvā vedissāmā”ti padesañāṇe
analyzed: yadā ākaṅkhasi iti na vadanti katham pana vadanti iti āha sutvā vedissāma ati padesa ñāṇe

original: ṭhitattā. Buddhā pana sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavārentīti sambandho. “Yakkhanarindadevasamaṇabrāhmaṇaparibbājakāna”nti
analyzed: ṭhita ttā buddhāḥ pana sabbaññu pavāraṇam pavārenti iti sambandhaḥ yakkha narinda deva samaṇa brāhmaṇa paribbājakānam ti

original: idaṃ “pucchāvuso yadākaṅkhasī”tiādīni suttapadāni pucchantānaṃ yesaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena
analyzed: idam puccha avuso yat ākaṅkhasi itiādīni sutta padāni pucchantānam yesam puggalānam vasena

original: āgatāni, taṃ dassanatthaṃ. “Pucchāvuso yadākaṅkhasī”ti idaṃ āḷavakassa yakkhassa
analyzed: āgatāni tam dassana attham puccha avuso yat ākaṅkhasi iti idam āḷavakassa yakkhassa

original: okāsakaraṇaṃ, sesāni narindādīnaṃ. Manasicchasīti manasā icchasi. Pucchavho, yaṃ
analyzed: okāsa karaṇam sesāni narinda ādīnam manasi icchasi iti manasā icchasi pucchavhaḥ yam

original: kiñci manasicchathāti bāvarissa saṃsayaṃ manasā pucchavho. Tumhākaṃ pana sabbesaṃ
analyzed: kiñci manasi icchatha ati bāvarissa saṃsayam manasā tumhākam pana sabbesam

original: yaṃ kiñci sabbasaṃsayaṃ manasā, aññathā ca, yathā icchatha, tathā pucchavhoti adhippāyo.
analyzed: yam kiñci sabba saṃsayam manasā aññathā ca yathā icchatha tathā pucchavhaḥ ti adhippāyaḥ

original: Sādhurūpāti sādhusabhāvā. Dhammoti paveṇīdhammo. Vuddhanti sīlādīhi buddhippattaṃ,
analyzed: sādhu rūpā ati sādhu sabhāvā dhammo ti paveṇī dhammo sīla ādīhi buddhi ppattam

original: garunti attho. Esa bhāroti esa saṃsayūpacchedanasaṅkhāto bhāro, āgato bhāro avassaṃ
analyzed: garunti attho esa bhāro ti esa saṃsayu upacchedana saṅkhātaḥ bhāraḥ āgataḥ bhāraḥ avassam

original: āvahitabboti adhippāyo. Ñatvā sayanti parūpadesena vinā sayameva ñatvā.
analyzed: āvahitabbaḥ ti adhippāyaḥ ñatvā sayanti para upadesena vinā sayam eva ñatvā

original: Suciratenāti evaṃ nāmakena brāhmaṇena. Tagghāti ekaṃsena. Yathāpi kusalo tathāti
analyzed: suciratena ati evam nāmakena brāhmaṇena ekaṃsena yathā api kusalo tathā iti

original: yathā sabbadhammakusalo sabbavidū jānāti katheti, tathā ahamakkhissaṃ. Rājā ca kho
analyzed: yathā sabba dhamma kusalaḥ sabba vidū jānāti kathā iti tathā aham akkhissam rājā ca kho

original: taṃ yadi kāhati vā na vāti yo taṃ idha pucchituṃ pesesi, so rājānaṃ tayā pucchitaṃ
analyzed: tam yadi kāhati vā na vāti yaḥ tam idha pucchitum pesesi saḥ rājānam tayā pucchitam

original: karotu vā mā vā, ahaṃ pana te akkhissaṃ akkhissāmi, ācikkhissāmīti attho.
analyzed: karotu vā mā vā aham pana te akkhissam akkhissāmi ācikkhissāmi iti atthaḥ

original: 163. Sippanaṭṭhena sikkhitabbatāya ca sippameva sippāyatanaṃ jīvikāya kāraṇabhāvato.
analyzed: sippana ṭṭhena sikkhitabba tāya ca sippam eva sippa āyatanam jīvikāya kāraṇa bhāvato

original: Seyyathidanti nipāto, tassa te katameti attho. Puthu sippāyatanānīti hi sādhāraṇato
analyzed: nipātaḥ tassa te katame iti attho puthu sippa āyatanāni iti hi sādhāraṇato

original: sippāni uddisitvā upari taṃtaṃsippūpajīvino niddiṭṭhā puggalādhiṭṭhānakathāya papañcaṃ
analyzed: sippāni uddisitvā upari taṃ taṃ sippu upajīvinaḥ niddiṭṭhā puggala adhiṭṭhāna kathāya

original: pariharituṃ. Aññathā yathādhippetāni tāva sippāyatanāni dassetvā puna taṃtaṃsippūpajīvīsu
analyzed: pariharitum aññathā yathā adhippetāni tāva sippa āyatanāni dassetvā puna taṃ taṃ sippūpajīvīsu

original: dassiyamānesu papañco siyāti. Tenāha “hatthārohā”tiādi.
analyzed: dassiyamānesu papañcaḥ siyāti tena āha hattha āroha atiādi

original: Hatthiṃ ārohanti, ārohāpayanti cāti hatthārohā. Yehi payogehi puriso hatthino ārohanayoggo
analyzed: hatthim ārohanti ārohāpayanti ca ati hattha ārohāḥ yehi payogehi purisaḥ hatthinaḥ ārohana yoggo

original: hoti, hatthissa taṃ payogaṃ vidhāyataṃ sabbesaṃ petesaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Tenāha “sabbepī”tiādi.
analyzed: hoti hatthissa tam payogam sabbesam gahaṇam tena āha sabbe pi itiādi

original: Tattha hatthācariyā nāma ye hatthino hatthārohakānañca sikkhapakā. Hatthivejjā nāma
analyzed: tattha hatthācariyāḥ nāma ye hatthinaḥ hattha ārohakānam ca sikkhapakāḥ hatthivejjāḥ nāma

original: hatthibhisakkā. Hatthimeṇḍā nāma hatthīnaṃ pādarakkhakā. Ādi-saddena hatthīnaṃ yavasadāyakādike
analyzed: hatthi bhisakkāḥ hatthimeṇḍāḥ nāma hatthīnam pādarakkhakāḥ ādi saddena hatthīnam yavasa dāyaka ādike

original: saṅgaṇhāti. Assārohā rathikāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Rathe niyuttā rathikā. Ratharakkhā
analyzed: saṅgaṇhāti assa ārohā rathikā ati ettha api esā iva nayo rathe niyuttā rathikā ratha rakkhā

original: nāma rathassa āṇirakkhakā. Dhanuṃ gaṇhanti, gaṇhāpenti cāti dhanuggahā, issāsā dhanusippassa
analyzed: nāma rathassa āṇi rakkhakāḥ dhanum gaṇhanti gaṇhāpenti ca ati dhanuggahāḥ issāsāḥ dhanu sippassa

original: sikkhāpakā ca. Tenāha “dhanuācariyā issāsā”ti. Celena celapaṭākāya yuddhe akanti
analyzed: sikkhāpakā ca tena āha dhanu ācariyā celena cela paṭākāya yuddhe

original: gacchantīti celakāti āha “ye yuddhe jayadhajaṃ gahetvā purato gacchantī”ti. Yathā
analyzed: gacchanti iti celakāti āha ye yuddhe jaya dhajam gahetvā puratas gacchanti iti yathā

original: tathā ṭhite senike byūhakaraṇavasena tato calayanti uccālentīti calakā. Sakuṇagghiādayo
analyzed: tathā ṭhite senike byūha karaṇa vasena tatas calayanti uccālenti iti calakā

original: viya maṃsapiṇḍaṃ parasenāsamūhaṃ sāhasikamahāyodhatāya chetvā chetvā dayanti uppatitvā
analyzed: maṃsa piṇḍam para senā samūham sāhasika mahā yodha tāya chetvā chetvā dayanti uppatitvā

original: uppatitvā gacchantīti piṇḍadāyakā. Dutiyavikappe piṇḍe dayanti janasammadde uppatantā
analyzed: uppatitvā gacchanti iti piṇḍa dāyakāḥ dutiya vikappe piṇḍe dayanti jana sammadde uppatantā

original: viya gacchantīti piṇḍadāyakāti attho veditabbo. Uggatuggatāti thāmajavaparakkamādivasena
analyzed: viya gacchanti iti piṇḍa dāyakā iti atthaḥ veditabbaḥ uggatuggatā ti thāma java parakkama ādi vasena

original: ativiya uggatā uggāti attho. Pakkhandantīti attano vīrasūrabhāvena asajjamānā parasenaṃ
analyzed: ativiya uggatāḥ uggā ati attho pakkhandantīti attanaḥ vīrasūra bhāvena a sajjamānā para senam

original: anupavisantīti attho. Thāmajavabalaparakkamādisampattiyā mahānāgā viya mahānāgā.
analyzed: anupavisanti iti attho thāma java bala parakkama ādi sampattiyā mahā nāgāḥ viya mahā nāgāḥ

original: Ekantasūrāti ekākisūrā attano sūrabhāveneva ekākino hutvā yujjhanakā. Sajālikāti
analyzed: ekanta sūrā iti ekāki sūrāḥ sūra bhāvena iva ekākinaḥ hutvā sa jālikā iti

original: savammikā. Saraparittāṇacammanti cammaparisibbitaṃ kheṭakaṃ, cammamayaṃ vā phalakaṃ.
analyzed: sa vammikā sara parittāṇa cammanti camma parisibbitam kheṭakam camma mayam vā phalakam

original: Gharadāsayodhāti antojātayodhā.
analyzed: antar jāta yodhā

original: Āḷāraṃ vuccati mahānasaṃ, tattha niyuttāti āḷārikā, bhattakārā. Pūvikāti pūvasampādakā,
analyzed: āḷāram vuccati mahānasam tattha niyuttā ati āḷārikā bhatta kārā pūvikā ati pūva sampādakā

original: ye pūvameva nānappakārato sampādetvā vikkiṇantā jīvanti. Kesanakhalikhanādivasena
analyzed: ye pūvam eva nānā pakārato sampādetvā vikkiṇantāḥ jīvanti kesa nakha likhana ādi vasena

original: manussānaṃ alaṅkāravidhiṃ kappenti saṃvidahantīti kappakā. Nhāpakāti cuṇṇavilepanādīhi
analyzed: manussānam alaṅkāra vidhim kappenti saṃvidahanti iti kappakāḥ nhāpakāḥ iti cuṇṇa vilepana ādīhi

original: malaharaṇavaṇṇasampādanavidhinā nhāpentīti nhāpakā. Navantādividhinā pavatto gaṇanagantho
antarā chiddābhāvena acchiddakoti vuccati, taṃ gaṇanaṃ upanissāya jīvantā acchiddakapāṭhakā.
analyzed: antarā chidda abhāvena acchiddakā ti vuccati tam gaṇanam upanissāya jīvantā acchiddaka pāṭhakā

original: Hatthena adhippāyaviññāpanaṃ hatthamuddā hattha-saddo cettha tadekadesesu aṅgulīsu
analyzed: hatthena adhippāya viññāpanam hattha muddā hattha saddo ca ittha tad ekadesesu aṅgulīsu

original: daṭṭhabbo. “Na bhuñjamāno sabbaṃ hatthaṃ mukhe pakkhipissāmī”tiādīsu viya, tasmā
analyzed: daṭṭhabbaḥ na bhuñjamānaḥ sabbam hattham mukhe pakkhipissāmi iti ādīsu viya tasmā

original: aṅgulisaṅkocanādinā gaṇanā hatthamuddāya gaṇanā. Cittakārādīnīti. Ādi-saddena bhamakārakoṭṭakalekhaka
analyzed: aṅguli saṅkocana ādinā gaṇanā hattham uddāya gaṇanā cittakāra ādīni iti ādi saddena bhamakāra koṭṭaka lekhaka

original: vilīvakārādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Diṭṭheva dhammeti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve. Sandiṭṭhikamevāti
analyzed: vilīva kāra ādīnam saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ diṭṭhā iva dhammā iti imasmin yeva atta bhāve sandiṭṭhikam eva ati

original: asamparāyikatāya sāmaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, sayaṃ anubhavitabbaṃ attapaccakkhaṃ diṭṭhadhammikanti
analyzed: asamparāyika tāya sāmam daṭṭhabbam sayam anubhavitabbam atta paccakkham diṭṭhadhammikanti

original: attho. Sukhitanti sukhappattaṃ. Uparīti devaloke. So hi manussalokato uparimo. Kammassa
analyzed: attho sukhitanti sukha ppattam upari iti deva loke saḥ hi manussa lokataḥ uparimaḥ kammassa

original: katattā nibbattanato tassa phalaṃ tassa aggisikhā viya hoti, tañca uddhaṃ devaloketi
analyzed: kata ttā nibbattanato tassa phalam tassa aggi sikhā viya hoti tat ca uddham deva loke iti

original: āha “uddhaṃ aggaṃ assā atthīti uddhaggikā”ti. Saggaṃ arahatīti attano phalabhūtaṃ
analyzed: āha uddham aggam assā atthi iti uddhaggikā ati saggam arahati iti attanaḥ phala bhūtam

original: saggaṃ arahati, tattha sā nibbattanārahoti attho. Sukhavipākāti iṭṭhavipākavipaccanīkā.
analyzed: saggam arahati tattha sā nibbattana arahā iti attho sukha vipākā ati iṭṭha vipāka vipaccanīkā

original: Suṭṭhu aggeti ativiya uttame uḷāre. Dakkhanti vaḍḍhanti etāyāti dakkhiṇā, pariccāgamayaṃ
analyzed: suṭṭhu agge iti ativiya uttame uḷāre dakkhanti vaḍḍhanti etāya ati dakkhiṇā pariccāgamayaṃ

original: puññanti āha “dakkhiṇaṃ dāna”nti.
analyzed: puññanti āha dakkhiṇam dānanti

original: Maggo sāmaññaṃ samitapāpasamaṇabhāvoti katvā. Yasmā ayaṃ rājā pabbajitānaṃ dāsakassakādīnaṃ
analyzed: maggo sāmaññam samita pāpa samaṇa bhāvaḥ ti katvā yasmai ayam rājā pabbajitānam dāsa kassaka ādīnam

original: lokato abhivādanādilābho sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalanti cintetvā “atthi nu kho koci
analyzed: lokataḥ abhivādana ādi lābho sandiṭṭhikam sāmañña phalanti cintetvā atthi nu kho koci

original: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā īdisamatthaṃ jānanto”ti vīmaṃsanto pūraṇādike pucchitvā tesaṃ
analyzed: samaṇaḥ vā brāhmaṇaḥ vā īdisam attham jānanto ti vīmaṃsanto pūraṇa ādike pucchitvā tesam

original: kathāya anārādhitacitto bhagavantampi tamatthaṃ pucchi, tasmā vuttaṃ “upari āgataṃ
analyzed: kathāya an ārādhita cittaḥ bhagavantam pi tam attham pucchi tasmā vuttam upari āgatam

original: pana dāsakassakopamaṃ sandhāya pucchatī”ti.
analyzed: pana dāsa kassaka upamam sandhāya pucchati iti

original: Kaṇhapakkhanti yathāpucchite atthe labbhamānaṃ diṭṭhigatūpasañhitaṃ saṃkilesapakkhaṃ.
analyzed: kaṇha pakkham ti yathā pucchite atthe labbhamānam diṭṭhi gata upasañhitam saṃkilesa pakkham

original: Sukkapakkhanti tabbidhuraṃ uparisuttāgataṃ vodānapakkhaṃ. Samaṇakolāhalanti samaṇakotūhalaṃ
analyzed: sukkapakkham ti tad bidhuram upari sutta āgatam vodāna pakkham samaṇa kolāhalanti samaṇa kotūhalam
