original: ayamattho laṭukikopamasuttena dīpetabbo. Tenāha “seyyathāpi, udāyi, puriso daliddo
analyzed: ayam atthaḥ laṭukikā upama suttena dīpetabbo tena āha seyyathā api udāyi purisaḥ daliddaḥ

original: assako anāḷhiyo, tassassa ekaṃ agārakaṃ oluggaviluggaṃ kākātidāyiṃ naparamarūpa”nti
analyzed: assakaḥ anāḷhiyaḥ tassassa ekam agārakam olugga viluggam kākātidāyim

original: vitthāro. Yadi appampi bhogaṃ pahāya pabbajituṃ dukkaraṃ, kasmā dāsavāre bhogaggahaṇaṃ
analyzed: vitthāraḥ yadi appam pi bhogam pahāya pabbajitum dukkaram kasmā dāsa vāre bhoga ggahaṇam

original: na katanti āha “dāsavāre panā”tiādi. Yathā ca dāsassa bhogāpi abhogā parāyattabhāvato,
analyzed: na āha dāsavāre yathā ca dāsassa bhogā api abhogā parāyatta bhāvataḥ

original: evaṃ ñātayo pīti dāsavāre ñātiparivaṭṭaggahaṇampi na katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: evam ñātayaḥ pi iti dāsa vāre ñāti parivaṭṭa ggahaṇam pi na katan ti daṭṭhabbaṃ

original: Paṇītatarasāmaññaphalavaṇṇanā
analyzed: paṇītatara sāmañña phala vaṇṇanā

original: 189. Evarūpāhīti yathāvuttadāsakassakūpamāsadisāhi upamāhi sāmaññaphalaṃ dīpetuṃ
analyzed: evarūpāhi iti upamāhi sāmañña phalam dīpetum

original: pahoti bhagavā sakalampi rattindivaṃ tato bhiyyopi anantapaṭibhānatāya vicittanayadesanabhāvato.
analyzed: pahoti bhagavā sakalam pi rattindivam tatas bhiyyas api ananta paṭibhāna tāya vicitta naya desana bhāvato

original: Tathāpīti satipi desanāya uttaruttarādhikanānānayavicittabhāve.
analyzed: tathā api iti desanāya uttara uttara adhika nānā naya vicitta bhāve

original: Ekatthametaṃ padaṃ sādhusaddasseva ka-kārena vaḍḍhitvā vuttattā, teneva sādhuka-saddassa
analyzed: ekattham etam padam sādhu saddassa iva kakārena vaḍḍhitvā vutta ttā tena iva sādhuka saddassa

original: atthaṃ vadantena atthuddhāravasena sādhu-saddo udāhaṭo. Āyācaneti abhimukhayācane,
analyzed: attham vadantena attha uddhāra vasena sādhu saddaḥ udāhaṭaḥ āyācanā iti abhimukha yācane

original: abhipatthanāyanti attho. Sampaṭicchaneti paṭiggaṇhane. Sampahaṃsaneti saṃvijjamānaguṇavasena
analyzed: abhipatthanāyanti attho sampaṭicchane iti paṭiggaṇhane sampahaṃsane iti saṃvijjamāna guṇa vasena

original: haṃsane tosane, udaggatākaraṇeti attho. Dhammarucīti puññakāmo. Paññāṇavāti paññavā.
analyzed: haṃsane tosane udagga tā karaṇe iti attho dhammarucī iti puñña kāmaḥ paññāṇavā ati paññavā

original: Addubbhoti adūsako, anupaghātakoti attho. Idhāpīti imasmiṃ sāmaññaphalepi. Ayaṃ sādhu-saddo.
analyzed: addubbhaḥ ti adūsakaḥ anupaghātakaḥ ti attho idha api iti imasmim sāmañña phale pi ayam sādhu saddo

original: Daḷhīkammeti sakkacca kiriyāyaṃ. Āṇattiyanti āṇāpane. “Suṇohi sādhukaṃ manasi karohī”ti
analyzed: daḷhīkamma iti sakkacca kiriyāyam āṇattiyanti āṇāpane suṇohi sādhukam manasi karohi iti

original: hi vutte sādhuka-saddena savanamanasikārānaṃ sakkaccakiriyā viya tadāṇāpanampi jotitaṃ

original: hoti, āyācanatthatā viya cassa āṇāpanatthatā veditabbā. Sundarepīti sundaratthepi.
analyzed: hoti āyācana attha tā viya cassa āṇāpana ttha tā veditabbā sundare pi iti sundara tthe pi

original: Idāni yathāvuttena sādhuka-saddassa atthattayena pakāsitaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ “daḷhīkammatthena hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: idāni yathāvuttena sādhuka saddassa atthattayena pakāsitam visesam dassetum daḷhī kamma atthena hi itiādi vuttaṃ

original: Manasi karohīti ettha manasikāro na ārammaṇapaṭipādanalakkhaṇo, atha kho vīthipaṭipādanajavanapaṭipādanamanasikārapubbakaṃ
analyzed: manasi karohi iti ettha manasikāraḥ na ārammaṇa paṭipādana lakkhaṇaḥ atha kho vīthi paṭipādana javana paṭipādana manasikāra pubbakam

original: citte ṭhapanalakkhaṇoti dassento “āvajjā”tiādimāha. Sotindriyavikkhepavāraṇaṃ savane
analyzed: citte ṭhapana lakkhaṇaḥ ti dassentaḥ āvajja āti ādim āha sotindriya vikkhepa vāraṇam savane

original: niyojanavasena kiriyantarapaṭisedhanabhāvato, sotaṃ odahāti attho. Manindriyavikkhepavāraṇaṃ
analyzed: niyojana vasena kiriya antara paṭisedhana bhāvato sotam odahāti atthaḥ man indriya vikkhepa vāraṇam

original: aññacintāpaṭisedhanato. Byañjanavipallāsaggāhavāraṇaṃ “sādhuka”nti visesetvā vuttattā.
analyzed: añña cintā paṭisedhanataḥ byañjana vipallāsa ggāha vāraṇam sādhukam ti visesetvā vutta ttā

original: Pacchimassa atthavipallāsaggāhavāraṇepi eseva nayo. Dhāraṇūpaparikkhādīsūti ādi-saddena
analyzed: pacchimassa attha vipallāsa ggāha vāraṇe pi esa iva nayaḥ dhāraṇa upaparikkhā ādīsu iti ādi saddena

original: tulanatīraṇādike, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividhe ca saṅgaṇhāti. Sabyañjanoti ettha yathādhippetamatthaṃ
analyzed: tulana tīraṇa ādike diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividhe ca saṅgaṇhāti ettha yathā adhippetam attham

original: byañjayatīti byañjanaṃ, sabhāvanirutti. Saha byañjanenāti sabyañjano, byañjanasampannoti
analyzed: byañjayati iti byañjanam sa bhāva nirutti saha byañjanena ati sa byañjanaḥ byañjana sampannaḥ iti

original: attho. Sātthoti araṇīyato upagantabbato anudhātabbato attho, catupārisuddhisīlādiko.
analyzed: attho sa attho ti araṇīyataḥ upagantabbataḥ anudhātabbataḥ attho catu pārisuddhi sīla ādiko

original: Tena saha atthenāti sāttho, atthasampannoti attho. Dhammagambhīrotiādīsu dhammo nāma
analyzed: tena saha atthena ati sātthaḥ attha sampannaḥ ti atthaḥ dhammagambhīraḥ ti ādīsu dhammaḥ nāma

original: tanti. Desanā nāma tassā manasā vavatthāpitāya tantiyā desanā. Attho nāma tantiyā
analyzed: tanti desanā nāma tassā manasā vavatthāpitāya tantiyāḥ desanā atthaḥ nāma tantiyā

original: attho. Paṭivedho nāma tantiyā, tantiatthassa ca yathābhūtāvabodho. Yasmā cete dhammadesanā
analyzed: attho paṭivedhaḥ nāma tantiyā tanti atthassa ca yathā bhūta avabodhaḥ yasmā ca ite dhamma desanā

original: atthappaṭivedhā sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo mandabuddhīhi dukkhogāhā, alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā
analyzed: attha ppaṭivedhā sasādīhi viya mahā samuddaḥ manda buddhīhi dukkha ugāhā a labbha neyya patiṭṭhā

original: ca, tasmā gambhīrā. Tena vuttaṃ “yasmā ayaṃ dhammo…pe… sādhukaṃ manasi karohī”ti.
analyzed: ca tasmai gambhīrā tena vuttam yasmai ayam dhammope sādhukam manasi karohi iti

original: Ettha ca paṭivedhassa dukkarabhāvato dhammatthānaṃ, desanāñāṇassa dukkarabhāvato

original: desanāya dukkhogāhatā, paṭivedhassa pana uppādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya, ñāṇuppattiyā
analyzed: desanāya dukkha ugāha tā paṭivedhassa pana uppādetum a sakkuṇeyya tāya ñāṇa uppattiyā

original: ca dukkarabhāvato dukkhogāhatā veditabbā. Desanaṃ nāma uddisanaṃ, tassa niddisanaṃ
analyzed: ca dukkara bhāvataḥ dukkha ugāha tā veditabbā desanam nāma uddisanam tassa niddisanam

original: bhāsananti idhādhippetanti āha “vitthārato bhāsissāmī”ti. Paribyattaṃ kathanañhi
analyzed: bhāsananti idha adhippetanti āha vitthārataḥ bhāsissāmi iti paribyattam kathanam hi

original: bhāsanaṃ, tenāha “desessāmīti…pe… vitthāradīpana”nti.
analyzed: bhāsanam tena āha vitthāra dīpanam ti

original: Yathāvuttamatthaṃ suttapadena samatthetuṃ “tenāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sāḷikāyiva nigghosoti
analyzed: yathāvuttam attham sutta padena samatthetum tena āha atiādi vuttam

original: sāḷikāya ālāpo viya madhuro kaṇṇasukho pemanīyo. Paṭibhānanti saddo. Udīrayīti uccārīyati, vuccati vā.

original: Evaṃ vutte ussāhajātoti evaṃ “suṇohi sādhukaṃ manasi karohi bhāsissāmī”ti vutte “na kira bhagavā saṅkhepeneva desessati, vitthārenapi bhāsissatī”ti sañjātussāho haṭṭhatuṭṭho hutvā.
analyzed: evam vutte ussāha jātaḥ ti evam suṇohi sādhukam manasi karohi bhāsissāmi iti vutte na kira bhagavā saṅkhepena iva desessati vitthārena api bhāsissati iti sañjāta ussāhaḥ haṭṭha tuṭṭhaḥ hutvā

original: 190. “Idhā”ti iminā vuccamānaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ tathāgatassa uppattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ adhippetanti
analyzed: idha ati iminā vuccamānam adhikaraṇam tathāgatassa uppatti ṭṭhāna bhūtam adhippetanti

analyzed: āha desa apadese nipāto ti sāmaññataḥ idha sadda mattam gaṇhāti na yathā visesitabbam

analyzed: idha saddam tathā hi vakkhati katthaci pada pūraṇam attam eva ati lokam upādāya vuccati

analyzed: loka saddena samāna adhikaraṇa bhāvena vutta ttā sesa pada dvaye pana pada antara sannidhāna mattena

original: ayaṃ cakkavāḷo “loko”ti adhippeto. Samaṇoti sotāpanno. Dutiyo samaṇoti sakadāgāmī.

original: Vuttañhetaṃ “katamo ca bhikkhave samaṇo? Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ
analyzed: vuttam ha etam katamaḥ ca bhikkhave samaṇaḥ idha bhikkhave bhikkhu tiṇṇam saṃyojanānam

original: parikkhayā sotāpanno hotī”tiādi. “Katamo ca bhikkhave dutiyo samaṇo? Idha bhikkhave
analyzed: parikkhayā sotāpannaḥ hoti itiādi katamo ca bhikkhave dutiyaḥ samaṇaḥ idha bhikkhave

original: padesaṃ. Idheva tiṭṭhamānassāti imissā eva indasālaguhāyaṃ tiṭṭhamānassa.
analyzed: padesam idha iva tiṭṭhamānassa ati imissā eva indasālaguhāyam tiṭṭhamānassa

original: Padapūraṇamattameva okāsāpadisanassāpi asambhavato atthantarassa abodhanato. Arahanti
analyzed: pada pūraṇa mattam eva okāsa apadisanassa api asambhavataḥ atthantarassa a bodhanataḥ arahanti

analyzed: ādayo saddāḥ vitthāritā ati yojanā atthataḥ vitthāraṇam sadda mukhena iva hoti iti sadda ggahaṇam

original: Yasmā. “Aparehipi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgato”tiādinā udānaṭṭhakathādīsu,
analyzed: yasmai aparehi pi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgataḥ iti ādinā udāna ṭṭhakathā ādīsu

original: arahanti ādayo visuddhimaggaṭīkāyaṃ aparehi pakārehi vitthāritā, tasmātesu vuttānayenapi
analyzed: arahanti ādayaḥ visuddhi magga ṭīkāyam aparehi pakārehi vitthāritā

original: so attho veditabbo. Tathāgatassa sattanikāyantogadhatāya “idha pana sattaloko adhippeto”ti
analyzed: saḥ atthaḥ veditabbo tathāgatassa satta nikāya ntogadha tāya idha pana satta lokaḥ adhippeto ti

original: vatvā tatthāyaṃ yasmiṃ sattanikāye yasmiñca okāse uppajjati, taṃ dassetuṃ “sattaloke
analyzed: vatvā tattha ayam yasmin satta nikāye yasmin ca okāse uppajjati tam dassetum satta loke

original: uppajjamānopi cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Tathāgato na devaloke uppajjatī”tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ,
analyzed: uppajjamānaḥ api ca atiādi vuttam tathāgataḥ na deva loke uppajjati iti ādīsu yam vattabbam

original: taṃ parato āgamissati. Sārappattāti kulabhogissariyādivasena sārabhūtā. Brāhmaṇagahapatikāti
analyzed: tam paratas āgamissati sāra ppattā ati kula bhogissariyā ādi vasena sāra bhūtā brāhmaṇa gahapatikā ati

original: brahmāyupokkharasātiādibrāhmaṇā ceva anāthapiṇḍikādigahapatikā ca.
analyzed: brahmāyu pokkharasāti ādi brāhmaṇā ca iva anāthapiṇḍika ādi gahapatikā ca

original: “Sujātāyā”tiādinā vuttesu catūsu vikappesu paṭhamo vikappo buddhabhāvāya āsannatarapaṭipattidassanavasena

analyzed: vuttaḥ āsannatarāya hi paṭipattiyā ṭhitaḥ uppajjati iti vuccati uppādassa ekantika ttā

original: pageva paṭipattiyā matthake ṭhito. Dutiyo buddhabhāvāvahapabbajjato paṭṭhāya āsannapaṭipattidassanavasena,
analyzed: pagā iva paṭipattiyāḥ matthake ṭhitaḥ dutiyaḥ buddha bhāva āvaha pabbajjato paṭṭhāya āsanna paṭipatti dassana vasena

original: tatiyo buddhakaradhamma pāripūrito paṭṭhāya buddhabhāvāya paṭipattidassanavasena.
analyzed: tatiyaḥ buddha kara dhamma pāripūritaḥ paṭṭhāya buddha bhāvāya paṭipatti dassana vasena

original: Na hi mahāsattānaṃ uppatibhavūpapattito paṭṭhāya bodhisambhārasambharaṇaṃ nāma atthi.

original: Catuttho buddhakaradhammasamārambhato paṭṭhāya. Bodhiyā niyatabhāvappattito pabhuti
analyzed: catutthaḥ buddha kara dhamma samārambhataḥ paṭṭhāya bodhiyā niyata bhāva ppattitaḥ pabhuti

original: hi viññūhi “buddho uppajjatī”ti vattuṃ sakkā uppādassa ekantikattā. Yathā pana sandanti
analyzed: hi viññūhi buddhaḥ uppajjati iti vattum sakkā uppādassa ekantika ttā yathā pana sandanti

original: nadiyoti sandanakiriyāya avicchedamupādāya vattamānappayogo, evaṃ uppādatthāya paṭipajjanakiriyāya
analyzed: nadiyā iti sandana kiriyāya avicchedam upādāya vattamāna ppayogaḥ evam uppāda tthāya paṭipajjana kiriyāya

original: avicchedamupādāya catūsu vikappesu “uppajjati nāmā”ti vuttaṃ. Sabbapaṭhamaṃ uppannabhāvanti

original: catūsu vikappesu sabbapaṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ tathāgatassa uppannatāsaṅkhātaṃ atthibhāvaṃ.
analyzed: catūsu vikappesu sabba paṭhamam vuttam tathāgatassa uppanna tā saṅkhātam atthi bhāvam

original: Tenāha “uppanno hotīti ayañhettha attho”ti.
analyzed: tena āha uppannaḥ hoti iti ayam ha ittha atthaḥ ti

original: So bhagavāti yo “tathāgato araha”ntiādinā kittitaguṇo, so bhagavā. “Imaṃ loka”nti
analyzed: saḥ bhagavā iti yaḥ tathāgataḥ arahanti ādinā so bhagavā imam lokanti

original: nayidaṃ mahājanassa sammukhamattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, atha kho anavasesaṃ pariyādāyāti
analyzed: na yidam mahājanassa sammukha mattam sandhāya vuttam atha kho anavasesam pariyādāya ati

original: dassetuṃ “sadevaka”ntiādi vuttaṃ, tenāha “idāni vattabbaṃ nidassetī”ti. Pajātattāti
analyzed: dassetum sa devakam ti ādi vuttam tena āha idāni vattabbam nidasseti iti pajāta ttā ti

original: yathāsakaṃ kammakilesehi nibbattattā. Pañcakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ pārisesañāyena
analyzed: yathāsakam kamma kilesehi nibbatta ttā pañca kāmāvacara deva ggahaṇam pārisesa ñāyena

original: itaresaṃ padantarehi saṅgahitattā. Sadevakanti ca avayavena viggaho samudāyo samāsattho.
analyzed: itaresam pada antarehi saṅgahita ttā sa devakam ti ca avayavena viggahaḥ samudāyaḥ samāsa tthaḥ

original: Chaṭṭhakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ paccāsattiñāyena. Tattha hi so jāto, taṃnivāsī ca.
analyzed: chaṭṭha kāmāvacara deva ggahaṇam paccāsatti ñāyena tattha hi saḥ jātaḥ tad nivāsī ca

original: Brahmakāyikādibrahmaggahaṇanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Paccatthika …pe… samaṇabrāhmaṇaggahaṇanti
analyzed: ettha api esa iva nayo paccatthika pe samaṇa brāhmaṇa ggahaṇanti

original: nidassanamattametaṃ apaccatthikānaṃ, asamitābāhitapāpānañca samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇīvacanena
analyzed: nidassanam attam etam a paccatthikānam a samita abāhita pāpānam ca samaṇa brāhmaṇānam sa samaṇa brāhmaṇī vacanena

original: gahitattā. Kāmaṃ “sadevaka”ntiādi visesanānaṃ vasena sattavisayo lokasaddoti viññāyati
analyzed: gahita ttā kāmam visesa nānam vasena satta visayaḥ loka saddo ti viññāyati

original: tulyayogavisayattā tesaṃ, “salomako sapakkhako”tiādīsu pana atulyayogepi ayaṃ samāso
analyzed: tulya yoga visaya ttā tesam salomakaḥ sapakkhakaḥ ti ādīsu pana atulya yoge pi ayam samāsaḥ

original: labbhatīti byabhicāradassanato pajāgahaṇanti āha “pajāvacanena sattalokaggahaṇa”nti.
analyzed: labbhati iti byabhicāra dassanataḥ pajā gahaṇanti āha pajā vacanena satta loka ggahaṇanti

original: Arūpino sattā attano āneñjavihārena viharantā dibbantīti devāti imaṃ nibbacanaṃ labhantīti

original: vutto. Yena hi payogena pariyesanādi nipphajjati, so tabbisayavijānanampi nipphādeti
analyzed: vuttaḥ yena hi payogena pariyesana ādi nipphajjati saḥ tad visaya vijānanam pi nipphādeti

original: nāma tadavinābhāvato. Atha vā sammāpayogaṃ sammāpaṭipatti manvāya āgamma ābhujati
analyzed: nāma tad avinābhāvataḥ atha vā sammā payogam sammā paṭipatti manvāya āgamma ābhujati

original: samannāharati. Ābhogapubbako hi sabbopi viññāṇabyāpāroti tathā vuttaṃ.
analyzed: samannāharati ābhoga pubbakaḥ hi sabbaḥ api viññāṇa byāpāraḥ ti tathā vuttam

original: Gamanatoti bhikkhācāravasena gocaragāmaṃ uddissa gamanato. Pariyesanatoti gocaragāme
analyzed: gamanato ti bhikkhā cāra vasena gocara gāmam uddissa gamanato pariyesanato ti gocara gāme

original: bhikkhatthaṃ āhiṇḍanato. Paribhogatoti āhārassa paribhuñjanato. Āsayatoti pittādiāsayato.
analyzed: bhikkha attham āhiṇḍanataḥ paribhogataḥ ti āhārassa paribhuñjanataḥ āsayataḥ ti pitta ādi āsayataḥ

original: Āsayati ettha ekajjhaṃ pavattamānopi kammaphalavavatthito hutvā mariyādavasena aññamaññaṃ

original: Mariyādattho hi ayamākāro. Nidhānanti yathābhutto āhāro nicito hutvā tiṭṭhati etthāti

original: nidhānaṃ, āmāsayo. Tato nidhānato. Aparipakkatoti gahaṇīsaṅkhātena kammajatejena

original: avipakkato. Paripakkatoti yathābhuttassa āhārasa vipakkabhāvato. Phalatoti nipphattito.
analyzed: a vipakkato paripakkato ti yathā bhuttassa āhārasa vipakka bhāvato phalato ti nipphattito

original: Nissandatoti ito cito ca nissandanato. Sammakkhanatoti sabbaso makkhanato. Ayamettha
analyzed: nissandato ti itas ca itas ca nissandanato sammakkhanato ti sabbasas makkhanato ayam ettha

original: saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāya gahetabbo.

original: Sarīrato sedā muccantīti vegasaṃdhāraṇena uppannapariḷāhato sarīrato sedā muccanti.
analyzed: sarīrataḥ sedāḥ muccanti iti vega saṃdhāraṇena uppanna pariḷāhataḥ sarīrataḥ sedāḥ muccanti

original: Aññe ca rogā kaṇṇasūlabhagandarādayo. Aṭṭhāneti manussāmanussapariggahite ayuttaṭṭhāne

original: veḷunāḷiādiudakabhājanato. Tanti chaḍḍitaudakaṃ.

original: Addhānairiyāpathā ciratarappavattikā dīghakālikā iriyāpathā. Majjhimā bhikkhācaraṇādivasena
analyzed: addhāna airiyāpathā ciratara ppavattikā dīgha kālikā iriyāpathā majjhimā bhikkhā caraṇa ādi vasena

analyzed: ca kāyassa abhiharaṇam vuttanti idha gamanam eva gahitanti keci

original: Yasmā mahāsivattheravāde anantare anantare iriyāpathe pavattarūpārūpadhammānaṃ tattha

analyzed: atthi etassa hi padassa ayam vitthāraḥ ti iminā satiyā ñāṇena sa madhura taṃyā iva vibhāveti

analyzed: visum katvā iminā api sampajaññassa viya satiyā apa ittha padhāna tam eva vibhāveti

analyzed: tattha na tāva assa atītā jāti khīṇā magga bhāvanāya ati adhippāyaḥ tattha kāraṇam āha

original: tassa ca khepane vāyāmopi labbhateva, tenāha “yā pana maggassā”tiādi. Ekacatupañcavokārabhavesūti

original: jātiṃ. Soti khīṇāsavo bhikkhu.
analyzed: jātim so ti khīṇa asavaḥ bhikkhu

analyzed: brahmacariya vāsaḥ nāma ukkaṭṭha niddesena magga brahmacariyassa nibbattanam eva ati āha

analyzed: parivutthanti sammādiṭṭhiyā catūsu saccesu pariññā ādi kicca sādhana vasena pavattamānāya

original: tāyati ekaṃsikavisayatāya rakkhatīti gottaṃ. Yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇabhūtena atthena
analyzed: tāyati ekaṃsika visaya tāya rakkhati iti gottam yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇa bhūtena atthena

original: vinā na vattati, evaṃ abhidhānaṃ abhidheyyabhūtena, tasmā so gottasaṅkhāto attho
analyzed: vinā na vattati evam abhidhānam abhidheyya bhūtena tasmā saḥ gotta saṅkhātaḥ attho

original: tāni tāyati rakkhatīti vuccati. Ko pana soti? Aññakulaparamparāsādhāraṇaṃ tassa kulassa
analyzed: tāni tāyati rakkhati iti vuccati kaḥ pana so ti añña kula paramparā sādhāraṇam tassa kulassa

original: ādipurisasamudāgataṃ taṃkulapariyāpannasādhāraṇaṃ sāmaññarūpanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ettha
analyzed: ādi purisa samudāgatam taṃkula pariyāpanna sādhāraṇam sāmañña rūpan ti daṭṭhabbam ettha

original: ca “samaṇo”ti iminā sarikkhakajanehi bhagavato bahumatabhāvo dassito samitapāpatākittanato.
analyzed: ca samaṇaḥ ti iminā sa rikkhaka janehi bhagavataḥ bahu mata bhāvaḥ dassitaḥ samita pāpa tā kittanato

original: “Gotamo”ti iminā lokiyajanehi uḷārakulasambhūtatādīpanato.
analyzed: gotama uti iminā lokiya janehi uḷāra kula sambhūta tā dīpanataḥ

original: Uccākulaparidīpanaṃ uditoditavipulakhattiyakulavibhāvanato. Sabbakhattiyānañhi ādibhūtamahāsammatamahārājato
analyzed: ucca ākula paridīpanam udita udita vipula khattiya kula vibhāvanataḥ sabba khattiyānam hi ādi bhūta mahāsammata mahārājato

original: paṭṭhāya asambhinnaṃ uḷāratamaṃ sakyarājakulaṃ. Kenaci pārijuññenāti ñātipārijuññabhogapārijuññādinā
analyzed: paṭṭhāya asambhinnam uḷāratamam sakya rāja kulam kenacid pārijuññena ati ñāti pārijuñña bhoga pārijuñña ādinā

original: kenaci pārijuññena pārihāniyā. Anabhibhūto anajjhotthato. Tathā hi tassa kulassa
analyzed: kenaci pārijuññena pārihāniyā an abhibhūtaḥ an ajjhotthato tathā hi tassa kulassa

original: na kiñci pārijuññaṃ lokanāthassa abhijātiyaṃ, atha kho vaḍḍhiyeva. Abhinikkhamane
analyzed: na kiñci pārijuññam lokanāthassa abhijātiyam atha kho vaḍḍhiyā iva abhinikkhamane

original: ca tatopi samiddhatamabhāvo loke pākaṭo paññāto. Iti “sakyakulā pabbajito”ti idaṃ
analyzed: ca tatas pi samiddhatama bhāvaḥ loke pākaṭaḥ paññātaḥ iti sakya kulā pabbajito ti idam

original: vacanaṃ bhagavato saddhāpabbajitabhāvadīpanaṃ vuttaṃ mahantaṃ ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ, mahantañca
analyzed: vacanam bhagavataḥ saddhā pabbajita bhāva dīpanam vuttam mahantam ñāti parivaṭṭam mahantam ca

original: bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya pabbajitabhāvasiddhito. Sundaranti bhaddakaṃ. Bhaddakatā ca
analyzed: bhogakkhandham pahāya pabbajita bhāva siddhitaḥ sundaran ti bhaddakam bhaddaka tā ca

original: passantassa hitasukhāvahabhāvena veditabbāti āha atthāvahaṃ sukhāvahanti. Tattha
analyzed: passantassa hita sukha āvaha bhāvena veditabbā ati āha attha āvaham sukha āvahanti tattha

original: atthāvahanti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthasaṃhitahitāvahaṃ. Sukhāvahanti yathāvuttatividhasukhāvahaṃ.
analyzed: attha āvahanti diṭṭhadhammika samparāyika paramattha saṃhita hita āvaham sukha āvahanti yathāvutta tividha sukha āvaham

original: Tathārūpānanti tādisānaṃ. Yādisehi pana guṇehi bhagavā samannāgato, tehi catuppamāṇikassa
analyzed: tathārūpānam ti tādisānam yādisehi pana guṇehi bhagavā samannāgataḥ tehi catuppamāṇikassa

original: lokassa sabbathāpi accantāya saddhāya pasādanīyo tesaṃ yathābhūtasabhāvattāti dassento
analyzed: lokassa sabbathā api accantāya saddhāya pasādanīyaḥ tesam yathā bhūta sabhāva ttā ati dassento

original: yathārūpotiādimāha. Tattha yathābhūtaṃ…pe… arahatanti iminā dhammappamāṇānaṃ, lūkhappamāṇānañca
analyzed: yathārūpā iti ādim āha tattha iminā dhamma ppamāṇānam lūkha ppamāṇānam ca

original: sattānaṃ bhagavato pasādāvahataṃ dasseti. Taṃ dassaneneva ca itaresampi atthato pasādāvahatā
analyzed: sattānam bhagavataḥ pasāda āvahatam dasseti tam dassanena iva ca itaresam pi atthataḥ pasāda āvaha tā

original: dassitā hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ tadavinābhāvato. Dassanamattampi sādhu hotīti ettha kosiyasakuṇavatthuṃ kathetabbaṃ.
analyzed: dassitā hoti iti daṭṭhabbam tad avinābhāvataḥ dassana mattam pi sādhu hoti iti ettha kosiya sakuṇa vatthum kathetabbam

original: Ambaṭṭhamāṇavakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: ambaṭṭha māṇava kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 256. Mante parivattetīti vede sajjhāyati, pariyāpuṇātīti attho. Mante dhāretīti yathāadhīte mante asammuṭṭhe katvā hadaye ṭhapeti oṭṭhapahatakaraṇavasena, na atthavibhāvanavasena.
analyzed: mante parivatteti iti vede sajjhāyati pariyāpuṇāti iti atthaḥ mante dhāreti iti yathā adhīte mante a sammuṭṭhe katvā hadaye ṭhapeti oṭṭha apahata karaṇa vasena na attha vibhāvana vasena

original: Sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānanti ettha vacanīyavācakabhāvena atthaṃ saddañca nikhaḍati bhindati
analyzed: ettha vacanīya vācaka bhāvena attham saddam ca nikhaḍati bhindati

original: vibhajja dassetīti nikhaṇḍu, sā eva idha kha-kārassa gha-kāraṃ katvā “nighaṇḍū”ti
analyzed: vibhajja dasseti iti nikhaṇḍu sā eva idha khakārassa ghakāram katvā nighaṇḍu iti

original: vutto. Kiṭayati gameti ñāpeti kiriyādivibhāgaṃ, taṃ vā anavasesapariyādānato gamento
analyzed: vuttaḥ kiṭayati gameti ñāpeti kiriyā ādi vibhāgam tam vā anavasesa pariyādānataḥ gamento

original: pūretīti keṭubhaṃ. Vevacanappakāsakanti pariyāyasaddadīpakaṃ, ekekassa atthassa anekapariyāyavacanavibhāvakanti
analyzed: pūreti iti keṭubham vevacana pakāsakam ti pariyāya sadda dīpakam ekekassa atthassa aneka pariyāya vacana vibhāvakam ti

original: attho. Nidassanamattañcetaṃ anekesampi atthānaṃ ekasaddavacanīyatāvibhāvanavasenapi
analyzed: atthaḥ anekesam pi atthānam eka sadda vacanīya tā vibhāvana vasena api

original: tassa ganthassa pavattattā. Vacībhedādilakkhaṇā kiriyā kappīyati etenāti kiriyākappo,
analyzed: tassa ganthassa pavatta ttā vacī bheda ādi lakkhaṇā kiriyā kappīyati etena ati kiriyākappo

original: so pana vaṇṇapadasambandhapadatthādivibhāgato bahuvikappoti āha “kiriyākappavikappo”ti.
analyzed: saḥ pana vaṇṇa pada sambandha padattha ādi vibhāgataḥ bahu vikappaḥ ti āha kiriyā kappa vikappaḥ ti

original: Idañca mūlakiriyākappaganthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. So hi satasahassaparimāṇo nayacariyādipakaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: idam ca mūla kiriyā kappa gantham sandhāya vuttam so hi sata sahassa parimāṇaḥ naya cariyā ādi pakaraṇam

original: Ṭhānakaraṇādivibhāgato, nibbacanavibhāgato ca akkharā pabhedīyanti etehīti akkharappabhedā,
analyzed: ṭhāna karaṇa ādi vibhāgataḥ nibbacana vibhāgataḥ ca akkharā etehi iti akkhara ppabhedā

original: sikkhāniruttiyo. Etesanti vedānaṃ.
analyzed: sikkhā niruttiyaḥ etesanti vedānam

original: Te eva vede padaso kāyatīti padako. Taṃ taṃ saddaṃ tadatthañca byākaroti byācikkhati
analyzed: te eva vede padaso kāyati iti padako tam tam saddam tad attham ca byākaroti byācikkhati

original: etenāti byākaraṇaṃ, saddasatthaṃ. Āyatiṃ hitaṃ tena loko na yatati na īhatīti lokāyataṃ.
analyzed: etena ati byākaraṇam āyatim hitam tena lokaḥ na yatati na īhati iti lokāyatam

original: Tañhi ganthaṃ nissāya sattā puññakiriyāya cittampi na uppādenti.
analyzed: tat hi gantham nissāya sattā puñña kiriyāya cittam pi na uppādenti

original: Vayatīti vayo, ādimajjhapariyosānesu katthaci aparikilamanto avitthāyanto te ganthe
analyzed: vayati iti vayaḥ ādi majjha pariyosānesu katthaci a parikilamantaḥ a vitthāyantaḥ te ganthe

original: sandhāreti pūretīti attho. Dve paṭisedhā pakatiṃ gamentīti dassento “avayo na hotī”ti
analyzed: sandhāreti pūreti iti atthaḥ dve paṭisedhā pakatim gamenti iti dassentaḥ avayaḥ na hoti iti

original: vatvā tattha avayaṃ dassetuṃ “avayo nāma…pe… na sakkotī”ti vuttaṃ. “Anuññāto”ti padassa
analyzed: vatvā tattha avayam dassetum avayaḥ nāmape na sakkoti iti vuttam anuññātaḥ iti padassa

original: kammasādhanavasena, “paṭiññāto”ti pana padassa kattusādhanavasena attho veditabboti
analyzed: kamma sādhana vasena paṭiññātaḥ ti pana padassa kattu sādhana vasena atthaḥ veditabbaḥ ti

original: dassento “ācariyenā”tiādimāha. Ācariyaparamparābhataṃ ācariyakaṃ. Garūti bhāriyaṃ
analyzed: dassentaḥ ācariyena ati ādim āha ācariya paramparā bhatam ācariyakam bhāriyam

original: attānaṃ tato mocetvā gamanaṃ dukkaraṃ hoti. Anatthopi uppajjati nindābyārosaupārambhādi.
analyzed: attānam tatas mocetvā gamanam dukkaram hoti anatthaḥ api uppajjati nindā byārosa upārambha ādi

original: 257. “Abbhuggato”ti ettha abhisaddayogena itthambhūtākhyānatthavaseneva upayogavacanaṃ.
analyzed: abbhuggataḥ ti ettha abhisadda yogena itthambhūta ākhyāna ttha vasena iva upayoga vacanam

original: 258. Lakkhaṇānīti lakkhaṇadīpanāni mantapadāni. Antaradhāyantīti na kevalaṃ lakkhaṇamantāniyeva,
analyzed: lakkhaṇāni iti lakkhaṇa dīpanāni manta padāni antaradhāyanti iti na kevalam

original: atha kho aññānipi brāhmaṇānaṃ ñāṇabalābhāvena anukkamena antaradhāyanti. Tathā hi
analyzed: atha kho aññāni api brāhmaṇānam ñāṇa bala abhāvena anukkamena antaradhāyanti tathā hi

original: vadanti “ekasataṃ addhariyaṃ sākhā sahassavattako sāmā”tiādi. Paṇidhi …pe… mahatoti
analyzed: vadanti eka satam addhariyam sākhā sahassavattako paṇidhi pe

original: ettha paṇidhimahato samādānamahatoti ādinā paccekaṃ mahanta-saddo yojetabbo. Paṇidhimahantatādi
analyzed: ettha paṇidhi mahataḥ samādāna mahataḥ ti ādinā paccekam mahanta saddaḥ yojetabbo paṇidhi mahanta tā ādi

original: cassa buddhavaṃsacariyāpiṭakavaṇṇanādivasena veditabbo. Niṭṭhāti nipphattiyo. Bhavabhedeti
analyzed: cassa buddha vaṃsa cariyā piṭaka vaṇṇanā ādi vasena veditabbaḥ niṭṭhāti nipphattiyaḥ bhava bhede ti

original: bhavavisese. Ito ca etto ca byāpetvā ṭhitatā visaṭabhāvo.
analyzed: bhava visese itas ca ettas ca byāpetvā ṭhita tā visaṭa bhāvaḥ

original: Jātisāmaññatoti lakkhaṇajātiyā lakkhaṇabhāvamattena samānabhāvato. Yathā hi buddhānaṃ
analyzed: jāti sāmaññato ti lakkhaṇa jātiyāḥ lakkhaṇa bhāva mattena samāna bhāvataḥ yathā hi

original: lakkhaṇāni suvisadāni, suparibyattāni, paripuṇṇāni ca honti, na evaṃ cakkavattīnaṃ,
analyzed: lakkhaṇāni su visadāni su paribyattāni paripuṇṇāni ca honti na evam cakkavattīnam

original: tenāha “na teheva buddho hotī”ti. Abhirūpatā, dīghāyukatā, appātaṅkatā, brāhmaṇādīnaṃ
analyzed: tena āha na tehā iva buddhaḥ hoti iti abhirūpa tā dīgha āyuka tā appa ātaṅka tā brāhmaṇa ādīnam

original: piyamanāpatāti imehi catūhi acchariyasabhāvehi. Dānaṃ, piyavacanaṃ, atthacariyā,
analyzed: imehi catūhi acchariya sabhāvehi dānam piya vacanam attha cariyā

original: samānattatāti imehi catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi. Rañjanatoti pītijananato. Cakkaṃ cakkaratanaṃ
analyzed: imehi catūhi saṅgaha vatthūhi rañjanato ti pīti jananato cakkam cakka ratanam

original: vatteti pavattetīti cakkavattī. Sampatticakkehi sayaṃ vattati, tehi ca paraṃ sattanikāyaṃ
analyzed: vatteti pavatteti iti cakkavattī sampatti cakkehi sayam vattati tehi ca param satta nikāyam

original: vatteti pavattetīti cakkavattī. Parahitāvaho iriyāpathacakkānaṃ vatto vattanaṃ etassa,
analyzed: vatteti pavatteti iti cakkavattī para hitāvahaḥ iriyāpatha cakkānam vattaḥ vattanam etassa

original: etthāti vā cakkavattī. Appaṭihataṃ vā āṇāsaṅkhātaṃ cakkaṃ vattetīti cakkavattī. Khattiyamaṇḍalādisaññitaṃ
analyzed: ettha ati vā cakkavattī a paṭihatam vā āṇā saṅkhātam cakkam vatteti iti cakkavattī khattiya maṇḍala ādi saññitam

original: cakkaṃ samūhaṃ attano vase vattetīti cakkavattī cakkavattivattasaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ
analyzed: cakkam samūham attanaḥ vase vatteti iti cakkavattī cakkavatti vatta saṅkhātam dhammam

original: carati, cakkavattivattasaṅkhāto dhammo etasmiṃ atthīti vā dhammiko. Dhammato anapetattā
analyzed: carati cakkavatti vatta saṅkhātaḥ dhammaḥ etasmin atthi iti vā dhammikaḥ dhammataḥ an apeta ttā

original: dhammo rañjanaṭṭhena rājāti dhammarājā. “Rājā hoti cakkavattī”ti vuttattā “cāturanto”ti
analyzed: dhammaḥ rañjana ṭṭhena rājā ati dhammarājā rājā hoti cakkavattī iti vutta ttā cāturanto ti

original: padaṃ catudīpissarataṃ vibhāvetīti āha “catusamuddaantāyā”tiādi. Tattha “catuddīpavibhūsitāyā”ti
analyzed: padam vibhāveti iti āha catu samudda antāya atiādi tattha catu ddīpa vibhūsitāya ati

original: avatvā “catubbidhā”ti vidhaggahaṇaṃ taṃtaṃparittadīpānampi saṅgahatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: a vatvā catubbidhā ati vidha ggahaṇam saṅga hattham ti daṭṭhabbam

original: Kopādīti ādi-saddena kāmamohamānamadādike saṅgaṇhāti. Vijitāvīti vijitavā. Kenaci
analyzed: kopa ādi iti ādi saddena kāma moha māna mada ādike saṅgaṇhāti vijitāvī iti kenacid

original: akampiyaṭṭhena janapade thāvariyappatto, daḷhabhattibhāvato vā, janapado thāvariyaṃ
analyzed: a kampiya ṭṭhena janapade thāvariya pattaḥ daḷha bhatti bhāvataḥ vā janapadaḥ thāvariyam

original: patto etthāti janapadatthāvariyappatto.
analyzed: pattaḥ ettha ati janapadatthāvariya pattaḥ

original: Cittīkatabhāvādināpi cakkassa ratanaṭṭho veditabbo. Esa nayo sesesupi. Ratinimittatāya
analyzed: cittīkata bhāva ādinā api cakkassa rata naṭṭho veditabbo esa nayo sesesu pi rati nimitta tāya

original: vā cittīkatādibhāvassa ratijananaṭṭhena ekasaṅgahatāya visuṃ aggahaṇaṃ. Imehi pana
analyzed: vā cittīkata ādi bhāvassa rati janana ṭṭhena eka saṅgahatāya visum aggahaṇam imehi pana

original: ratanehi rājā cakkavattī yaṃ yamatthaṃ paccanubhoti, taṃ taṃ dassetuṃ “imesu panā”tiādi
analyzed: ratanehi rājā cakkavattī yam yam attham paccanubhoti tam tam dassetum imesu pana atiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Ajitaṃ jināti mahesakkhatāsaṃvattaniyakammanissandabhāvato. Vijite yathāsukhaṃ
analyzed: vuttam ajitam jināti mahesakkha tā saṃvattaniya kamma nissanda bhāvataḥ vijite yathāsukham

original: anuvicarati hatthiratanaṃ assaratanañca abhiruhitvā tesaṃ ānubhāvena antopātarāseyeva
analyzed: anuvicarati hatthi ratanam assa ratanam ca abhiruhitvā tesam ānubhāvena

original: samuddapariyantaṃ pathaviṃ anusaṃyāyitvā rājadhānimeva paccāgamanato. Pariṇāyakaratanena
analyzed: samudda pariyantam pathavim anusaṃyāyitvā rājadhānim eva pacca āgamanataḥ pariṇāyaka ratanena

original: vijitamanurakkhati tena tattha tattha kātabbakiccassa saṃvidhānato. Avasesehīti maṇiratanaitthiratanagahapatiratanehi.
analyzed: vijitam anurakkhati tena tattha tattha kātabba kiccassa saṃvidhānataḥ avasesehi iti maṇi ratana aitthi ratana gahapati ratanehi

original: Tattha maṇiratanena yojanappamāṇe padese andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ālokadassanādinā sukhamanubhavati,
analyzed: tattha maṇi ratanena yojana ppamāṇe padese andhakāram vidhamitvā āloka dassana ādinā sukham anubhavati

original: itthiratanena atikkantamānusakarūpasampattidassanādivasena, gahapatiratanena icchiticchitamaṇikanakarajatādidhanapaṭilābhavasena.
analyzed: itthi ratanena atikkanta mānusaka rūpa sampatti dassana ādi vasena gahapati ratanena icchiti chita maṇi kanaka rajata ādi dhana paṭilābha vasena

original: Ussāhasattiyogo tena kenaci appaṭihatāṇācakkabhāvasiddhito pacchimenāti pariṇāyakaratanena.
analyzed: ussāha satti yogaḥ tena kenaci appaṭihata āṇācakka bhāva siddhito pacchimena ati pariṇāyaka ratanena

original: Tañhi sabbarājakiccesu kusalaṃ avirajjhanayogaṃ, tenāha “mantasattiyogo”ti. Hatthiassaratanānaṃ
analyzed: tat hi sabba rāja kiccesu kusalam a virajjhana yogam tena āha manta satti yogo ti hatthi assa rata nānam

original: mahānubhāvatāya kosasampattiyāpi pabhāvasampattisiddhito “hatthi…pe… yogo”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: mahā anubhāva tāya kosa sampattiyā api pabhāva sampatti siddhitaḥ hatthipe yogaḥ iti vuttam

original: (Koso hi nāma sati ussāhasampattiyaṃ duggaṃ tejaṃ kusumoraṃ parakkamaṃ pabbatomukhaṃ
analyzed: kosaḥ hi nāma sati ussāha sampattiyam duggam tejam kusuma uram parakkamam pabbatomukham

original: amosapaharaṇaṃ) tividhasattiyogaphalaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hotīti sambandho. Sesehīti sesehi pañcahi ratanehi.
analyzed: tividha satti yoga phalam paripuṇṇam hoti iti sambandhaḥ sesehi iti sesehi pañcahi ratanehi

original: Adosakusalamūlajanitakammānubhāvenāti adosasaṅkhātena kusalamūlena sahajātādipaccayavasena
analyzed: adosa kusala mūla janita kamma anubhāvena ati adosa saṅkhātena kusala mūlena sahajāta ādi paccaya vasena

original: uppāditakammassa ānubhāvena sampajjanti sommatararatanajātikattā. Majjhimāni maṇiitthigahapatiratanāni.
analyzed: uppādita kammassa ānubhāvena sampajjanti sommatara ratana jāti kattā majjhimāni maṇi itthi gahapati ratanāni

original: Alobha…pe… kammānubhāvena sampajjanti uḷārassa dhanassa, uḷāradhanapaṭilābhakāraṇassa

original: apanayanatthaṃ. Asmiṃ vacaneti “cattārome bho gotama vaṇṇā”tiādinā attanā vutte,

original: bhotā ca gotamena vutte “jātivāde”ti imasmiṃ yathādhikate vacane. Tattha pana yasmā
analyzed: bhotā ca gotamena vutte jāti vāde ti imasmim vacane tattha pana yasmā

original: vede vuttavidhināva tena paṭimantetabbaṃ hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “vedattayavacane”ti,
analyzed: vede vutta vidhinā ava tena paṭimantetabbam hoti tasmā vuttam veda ttaya vacanā iti

original: “etasmiṃ vā dāsiputtavacane”ti ca.
analyzed: etasmin vā dāsi putta vacanā iti ca

original: 270. Dhammo nāma kāraṇaṃ “dhammapaṭisambhidā”tiādīsu viya, saha dhammenāti sahadhammo, sahadhammo eva sahadhammikoti āha “sahetuko”ti.
analyzed: dhammaḥ nāma kāraṇam dhamma paṭisambhidā ti ādīsu viya saha dhammena ati saha dhammaḥ saha dhammaḥ eva saha dhammikaḥ iti āha sa hetukaḥ iti

original: 271. Tasmā tadā paṭiññātattā. Tāsetvā pañhaṃ vissajjāpessāmīti āgato yathā taṃ saccakasamāgame.
analyzed: tasmā tadā tāsetvā pañham vissajjāpessāmi iti āgataḥ yathā tam saccaka samāgame

original: “Bhagavā ceva passati ambaṭṭho cā”ti ettha itaresaṃ adassane kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “yadi
analyzed: bhagavā ca iva passati ambaṭṭhaḥ ca ati ettha itaresam a dassane kāraṇam dassetum yadi

original: hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Āvāhetvāti mantabalena ānetvā. Tassāti ambaṭṭhassa. Vādasaṅghaṭṭeti vācāsaṅghaṭṭe.
analyzed: hi itiādi vuttam āvāhetvā ati manta balena ānetvā tassa ati ambaṭṭhassa vāda saṅghaṭṭa iti vācā saṅghaṭṭe

original: 272. Tāṇanti gavesamānoti, “ayameva samaṇo gotamo ito bhayato mama tāyako”ti bhagavantaṃyeva
analyzed: tāṇanti gavesamānaḥ iti ayam eva samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ itas mama bhayatas mama

original: “tāṇa”nti pariyesanto upagacchanto. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Tāyatīti yathāupaṭṭhitabhayato
analyzed: tāṇanti pariyesantaḥ upagacchantaḥ sesa pada dvaye pi esa iva nayo tāyati iti yathā upaṭṭhita bhayato

original: pāleti, tenāha “rakkhatī”ti, etena tāṇa-saddassa kattusādhanatamāha. Yathupaṭṭhitena
analyzed: pāleti tena āha rakkhati iti etena tāṇa saddassa kattu sādhanatam āha yathā upaṭṭhitena

original: bhayena upadduto nilīyati etthāti leṇaṃ, upalayanaṃ, etena leṇa-saddassa adhikaraṇasādhanatamāha.
analyzed: bhayena upaddutaḥ nilīyati ettha ati leṇam upalayanam etena leṇa saddassa adhikaraṇa sādhanatam āha

original: “Saratī”ti etena saraṇa-saddassa kattusādhanatamāha.
analyzed: sarati iti etena saraṇa saddassa kattu sādhana tam āha

original: Ambaṭṭhavaṃsakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: ambaṭṭha vaṃsa kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 274. Gaṅgāya dakkhiṇatoti gaṅgāya nadiyā dakkhiṇadisāya. Āvudhaṃ na parivattatīti
analyzed: gaṅgāya dakkhiṇatas ti gaṅgāya nadiyāḥ dakkhiṇa disāya āvudham na parivattati iti

original: saraṃ vāsattiādiṃ vā parassa upari khipitukāmassa hatthaṃ na parivattati, hatthe
analyzed: saram vā āsatti ādim vā parassa upari khipitu kāmassa hattham na parivattati hatthe

original: pana aparivattente kuto āvudhaparivattananti āha “āvudhaṃ na parivattatī”ti. So kira
analyzed: pana a parivattente kutas āvudha parivattanam iti āha āvudham na parivattati iti saḥ kira

original: “kathaṃ nāmāhaṃ disāya dāsiyā kucchimhi nibbatto”ti taṃ hīnaṃ jātiṃ jigucchanto “handāhaṃ
analyzed: katham nāma aham disāya dāsiyā kucchimhi nibbattaḥ ti tam hīnam jātim jigucchantaḥ handa aham

original: yathā tathā imaṃ jātiṃ sodhessāmī”ti niggato, tenāha “idāni me manorathaṃ pūressāmī”tiādi.
analyzed: yathā tathā imam jātim sodhessāmi iti niggataḥ tena āha idāni me manoratham pūressāmi itiādi

original: Vijjābalena rājānaṃ tāsetvā tassa dhītuyā laddhakālato paṭṭhāya myāyaṃ jātisodhitā
analyzed: vijjābalena rājānam tāsetvā tassa dhītuyāḥ laddha kālataḥ paṭṭhāya myāyam jāti sodhitā

original: bhavissatīti tassa adhippāyo. Ambaṭṭhaṃ nāma vijjanti sattānaṃ sarīre abbhaṅgaṃ ṭhapetīti
analyzed: bhavissati iti tassa adhippāyaḥ ambaṭṭham nāma vijjanti sattānam sarīre abbhaṅgam ṭhapeti iti

original: ambaṭṭhāti evaṃ laddhanāmaṃ vijjaṃ, mantanti attho. Yato ambaṭṭhā etasmiṃ atthīti
analyzed: ambaṭṭha ati evam laddha nāmam vijjam mantanti atthaḥ yatas ambaṭṭhāḥ etasmin atthi iti

original: ambaṭṭhoti kaṇho isi paññāyittha, taṃbaṃsajātatāya ayaṃ māṇavo “ambaṭṭho”ti voharīyati.
analyzed: ambaṭṭho ti kaṇhaḥ isi paññāyittha taṃbaṃsa jāta tāya ayam māṇavaḥ ambaṭṭho ti voharīyati

original: Seṭṭhamante vedamanteti adhippāyo. Mantānubhāvena rañño bāhukkhambhamattaṃ jātaṃ
analyzed: seṭṭha mante veda mante iti adhippāyaḥ manta anubhāvena raññaḥ bāhu kkhambha mattam jātam

original: tena panassa bāhukkhambhena rājā, “ko jānāti, kiṃ bhavissatī”ti bhīto ussaṅkī utrāso
analyzed: tena panassa bāhukkhambhena rājā kaḥ jānāti kim bhavissati iti bhītaḥ ussaṅkī utrāsaḥ

original: ahosi, tenāha “bhayena vedhamāno aṭṭhāsī”ti. Sotthi bhaddanteti ādivacanaṃ avocuṃ.
analyzed: tena āha bhayena vedhamāno aṭṭhāsi iti sotthi bhaddanta iti ādi vacanam avocuṃ

original: “Ayaṃ mahānubhāvo isī”ti maññamānā.
analyzed: ayam mahā anubhāvaḥ isī iti maññamānā

original: Undriyissatīti vippakiriyissati, tenāha “bhijjissatī”ti. Mante parivattiteti bāhukkhambhakamantassa
analyzed: undriyissati iti vippakiriyissati tena āha bhijjissati iti mante parivattitā iti bāhukkhambhaka mantassa

original: paṭippassambhakavijjāsaṅkhāte mante “saro otaratū”ti parivattite. Evarūpānañhi mantānaṃ
analyzed: paṭippassambhaka vijjā saṅkhāte mante saraḥ otaratu uti parivattite evarūpānam hi mantānam

original: ekaṃseneva paṭippassambhakavijjā hontiyeva yathā taṃ kusumārakavijjānaṃ. Attano dhītu
analyzed: ekaṃsena iva paṭippassambhaka vijjāḥ yathā tam kusumāraka vijjānam attanaḥ

original: apavādamocanatthaṃ tassa bhujissakaraṇaṃ. Tassānurūpe issariye ṭhapanatthaṃ uḷāre
analyzed: apavāda mocana attham tassa bhujissa karaṇam tassa anurūpe issariye ṭhapana attham uḷāre

original: ca naṃ ṭhāne ṭhapesi.
analyzed: ca nam ṭhāne ṭhapesi

original: Khattiyaseṭṭhabhāvavaṇṇanā
analyzed: khattiya seṭṭha bhāva vaṇṇanā

original: 275. Samassāsanatthamāha karuṇāyanto, na kulīnabhāvadassanatthaṃ, tenāha “atha kho
analyzed: samassāsana attham āha karuṇāyantaḥ na kulīna bhāva dassana attham tena āha atha kho

original: bhagavā”tiādi. Brāhmaṇesūti brāhmaṇānaṃ samīpe, tato brāhmaṇehi laddhabbaṃ āsanādiṃ
analyzed: bhagavā atiādi brāhmaṇesu iti brāhmaṇānam samīpe tatas brāhmaṇehi laddhabbam āsana ādim

original: sandhāya “brāhmaṇānaṃ antare”ti vuttaṃ. Kevalaṃ saddhāya kātabbaṃ saddhaṃ, paralokagate
analyzed: sandhāya brāhmaṇānam antareti vuttam kevalam saddhāya kātabbam saddham para loka gate

original: sandhāya na tato kiñci apatthentena kātabbanti attho, tenāha “matake uddissa katabhatte”ti.
analyzed: sandhāya na tatas kiñci apatthentena kātabbanti attho tena āha matake uddissa kata bhatta iti

original: Maṅgalādibhatteti ādi-saddena ussavadevatārādhanādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Yaññabhatteti pāpasaññamādivasena
analyzed: maṅgala ādi bhattā iti ādi saddena ussava devatā ārādhana ādim saṅgaṇhāti yañña bhattā iti pāpa saññamā ādi vasena

original: katabhatte. Pāhunakānanti atithīnaṃ. Khattiyabhāvaṃ appatto ubhato sujātatābhāvato,
analyzed: kata bhatte atithīnam khattiya bhāvam appattaḥ ubhatas sujāta tā bhāvataḥ

original: tenāha “aparisuddhoti attho”ti.
analyzed: tena āha aparisuddhaḥ ti atthaḥ ti

original: 276. Itthiṃ karitvāti ettha karaṇaṃ kiriyāsāmaññavisayanti āha “itthiṃ pariyesitvā”ti.
analyzed: itthim karitvā iti ettha karaṇam kiriyā sāmañña visayanti āha itthim pariyesitvā iti

original: Brāhmaṇakaññaṃ itthiṃ khattiyakumārassa bhariyābhūtaṃ gahetvāpi khattiyāva seṭṭhā,
analyzed: brāhmaṇa kaññam itthim khattiya kumārassa bhariyā bhūtam gahetvā api khattiyā ava seṭṭhā

original: hīnā brāhmaṇāti yojanā. Purisena vā purisaṃ karitvāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Pakaraṇeti
analyzed: hīnāḥ brāhmaṇa ati yojanā purisena vā purisam karitvā iti ettha api eṣā iva nayā upakaraṇā iti

original: rāgādivasena paduṭṭhe pakkhalite kāraṇe, tenāha “dose”ti. Bhassati niratthakabhāvena
analyzed: rāga ādi vasena paduṭṭhe pakkhalite kāraṇe tena āha dosa iti bhassati niratthaka bhāvena

original: khipīyatīti bhassaṃ, chārikā.
analyzed: khipīyati iti bhassam chārikā

original: 277. Janitasminti kammakilesehi nibbatte. Jane etasminti vā janetasmiṃ, manussesūti attho, tenāha “gottapaṭisārino”ti. Saṃsanditvāti ghaṭetvā, aviruddhaṃ katvāti attho.
analyzed: janitasmin ti kamma kilesehi nibbatte jane etasmin ti vā janetasmin manussesu iti attho tena āha gotta paṭisārino ti saṃsanditvā ati ghaṭetvā aviruddham katvā iti attho

original: Paṭhamabhāṇavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: paṭhama bhāṇa vāra vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Vijjācaraṇakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: vijjā caraṇa kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 278. Idaṃ vaṭṭatīti idaṃ ajjhenādi kattuṃ labbhati. Jātivādavinibaddhāti jātisannissitavāde
analyzed: idam vaṭṭati iti idam kattum labbhati jāti vāda vinibaddhā ati jāti sannissita vāde

original: vinibaddhā. Brāhmaṇasseva ajjhenajjhāpanayajanayājanādayoti evaṃ ye attukkaṃsanaparavambhanavasena
analyzed: vinibaddhāḥ brāhmaṇassa iva evam ye attukkaṃsana paravambhana vasena

original: pavattā, tato eva te mānavādapaṭibaddhā ca honti. Ye pana āvāhavivāhavinibaddhā,
analyzed: te māna vāda paṭibaddhā ca honti ye pana āvāha vivāha vinibaddhā

original: te eva sambandhattayavasena “arahasi vā maṃ tvaṃ, na vā maṃ tvaṃ arahasī”ti evaṃ pavattanakā.
analyzed: te eva a rahasi vā mam tvam na vā mam tvam a rahasi iti evam pavattanakā

original: Yatthāti yassaṃ vijjācaraṇasampattiyaṃ. Laggissāmāti olaggā antogadhā bhavissāmāti
analyzed: yattha ati vijjā caraṇa sampattiyam laggissāma ati olaggāḥ antogadhāḥ bhavissāma ati

original: cintayimha. Paramatthato avijjācaraṇāniyeva “vijjācaraṇānī”ti gahetvā ṭhito paramatthato

original: vijjācaraṇesu vibhajiyamānesu so tato dūrato apanīto nāma hotīti āha “dūrameva avakkhipī”ti.
analyzed: vijjā caraṇesu vibhajiyamānesu saḥ tatas dūratas apanītaḥ nāma hoti iti āha dūram eva avakkhipi iti

original: Samudāgamato pabhutītiādisamuṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya.
analyzed: samudāgamataḥ pabhuti iti ādi samuṭṭhānataḥ paṭṭhāya

original: 279. Tividhaṃ sīlanti khuddakādibhedaṃ tividhaṃ sīlaṃ. Sīlavasenevāti sīlapariyāyeneva.
analyzed: tividham sīlanti khuddaka ādi bhedam tividham sīlam sīla vasena iva ati sīla pariyāyena iva

original: Kiñci kiñcīti ahiṃsanādiyamaniyamalakkhaṇaṃ kiñci kiñci sīlaṃ atthi. Tattha tattheva
analyzed: kiñci kiñci iti ahiṃsana ādi yama niyama lakkhaṇam kiñci kiñci sīlam atthi tattha tattha iva

original: laggeyyāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃyeva brāhmaṇasamayasiddhe sīlamatte “caraṇa”nti laggeyya.
analyzed: tasmin brāhmaṇa samaya siddhe sīla matte

original: Aṭṭhapi samāpattiyo caraṇanti niyyātitā honti rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaniddeseneva
analyzed: aṭṭha pi samāpattiyaḥ niyyātitāḥ honti rūpāvacara catuttha jhāna niddesena iva

original: arūpajjhānānampi niddiṭṭhabhāvāpattito niyyātitā nidassitā.
analyzed: arūpa jhānānam pi niddiṭṭha bhāva āpattitaḥ niyyāti tā nidassitā

original: Catuapāyamukhakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: catu apāya mukha kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 280. Asampāpuṇantoti ārabhitvā sampattuṃ asakkonto. Avisahamānoti ārabhitumeva asakkonto.
analyzed: a sampāpuṇantaḥ iti ārabhitvā sampattum a sakkontaḥ a visahamānaḥ iti ārabhitum eva a sakkontaḥ

original: Khārinti parikkhāraṃ. Taṃ pana vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “araṇī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha araṇīti
analyzed: khārin ti parikkhāram tam pana vibhajitvā dassetum araṇī itiādi vuttam tattha araṇī iti

original: aggidhamanakaṃ araṇīdvayaṃ. Sujāti dabbi. Ādi-saddena tidaṇḍatighaṭikādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti
analyzed: aggi dhamanakam araṇī dvayam sujāti dabbi ādi saddena ti daṇḍa ti ghaṭikā ādim saṅgaṇhāti

original: khāribharitanti khārīhi puṇṇaṃ. Nanu upasampannassa bhikkhuno sāsanikopi yo koci
analyzed: khāri bharitanti khārīhi puṇṇam nanu upasampannassa bhikkhuno sāsanikaḥ api yaḥ koci

original: anupasampanno atthato paricārakova, kiṃ aṅgaṃ pana bāhirakapabbajiteti tattha visesaṃ
analyzed: anupasampannaḥ atthato paricārakaḥ uva kim aṅgam pana bāhiraka pabbajitā iti tattha visesam

original: dassetuṃ “kāmañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vuttanayenāti “kappiyakaraṇa…pe… vattakaraṇavasenā”ti
analyzed: dassetum kāmañca atiādi vuttam vutta nayena ati kappiya karaṇa pe vatta karaṇa vasena ati

original: evaṃ vuttena nayena. Paricārako hoti upasampannabhāvassa visiṭṭhabhāvato. “Navakoṭisahassānī”tiādinā
analyzed: evam vuttena nayena paricārakaḥ hoti upasampanna bhāvassa visiṭṭha bhāvataḥ nava koṭi sahassāni itiādinā

original: vuttappabhedānaṃ anekasahassānaṃ saṃvaravinayānaṃ samādiyitvā vattanena uparibhūtā
analyzed: vutta ppabhedānam aneka sahassānam saṃvara vinayānam samādiyitvā vattanena uparibhūtā

original: aggabhūtā sampadāti hi “upasampadā”ti vuccatīti. Guṇādhikopīti guṇehi ukkaṭṭhopi.
analyzed: agga bhūtā sampadā ati hi upasampadā ati vuccati iti guṇa adhikaḥ api iti guṇehi ukkaṭṭhaḥ api

original: Ayaṃ panāti vuttalakkhaṇo tāpaso.
analyzed: ayam pana ati vutta lakkhaṇo tāpaso

original: Tāpasā nāma kammavādikiriyāvādino, na sāsanassa paṭāṇībhūtā, yato nesaṃ pabbajituṃ

original: āgatānaṃ titthiyaparivāsena vināva pabbajjā anuññātāti katvā “kasmā panā”ti codanaṃ
analyzed: āgatānam titthiya parivāsena vinā āva pabbajjā anuññātā ati katvā kasmā pana iti codanam

original: samuṭṭhapeti codako. Ācariyo “yasmā”tiādinā codanaṃ pariharati. “Osakkissatī”ti saṅkhepato
analyzed: samuṭṭhapeti codakaḥ ācariyaḥ yasmā iti ādinā codanam pariharati osakkissati iti saṅkhepato

original: vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “imasmiñhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Khuradhārūpamanti khuradhārānaṃ matthakeneva
analyzed: vuttam attham vivaritum imasmin hi itiādi vuttam matthakena iva

original: akkamitvā gamanūpamaṃ. Aññeti aññe bhikkhū. Aggisālanti aggihuttasālaṃ. Nānādārūhīti
analyzed: akkamitvā gamana upamam aññe iti aññe bhikkhū aggi sālanti aggi hutta sālam nānā dārūhi iti

original: palāsadaṇḍādinānāvidhasamidhādārūhi.
analyzed: palāsa daṇḍa ādi nānāvidha samidhādārūhi

original: Idanti “catudvāraṃ āgāraṃ katvā”tiādinā vuttaṃ. Assāti assa catutthassa puggalassa.
analyzed: idam ti catu dvāram āgāram katvā ati ādinā vuttam assa ati assa catutthassa puggalassa

original: Paṭipattimukhanti kohaññapaṭipattiyā mukhamattaṃ. So hi nānāvidhena kohaññena lokaṃ
analyzed: paṭipatti mukhanti kohañña paṭipattiyāḥ mukha mattam saḥ hi nānāvidhena kohaññena lokam

original: vimhāpento tattha acchati, tenāha “iminā hi mukhena so evaṃ paṭipajjatī”ti.
analyzed: vimhāpentaḥ tattha acchati tena āha iminā hi mukhena saḥ evam paṭipajjati iti

original: Khalādīsu manussānaṃ santike upatiṭṭhitvā vīhimuggatilamāsādīni bhikkhācariyāniyāmena
analyzed: khala ādīsu manussānam santike upatiṭṭhitvā vīhi mugga tila māsa ādīni bhikkhā cariyā niyāmena

original: saṅkaḍḍhitvā uñchanaṃ uñchā, sā eva cariyā vutti etesanti uñchācariyā. Aggipakkena
analyzed: saṅkaḍḍhitvā uñchanam uñchā sā eva cariyā uñchā cariyā aggi pakkena

original: jīvantīti aggipakkikā, na aggipakkikā anaggipakkikā. Uñchācariyā hi khalesu gantvā
analyzed: jīvanti iti aggi pakkikāḥ na aggi pakkikāḥ an aggi pakkikāḥ uñchā cariyāḥ hi khalesu gantvā

original: khalaggaṃ nāma manussehi diyyamānaṃ dhaññaṃ gaṇhanti, taṃ ime na gaṇhantīti anaggipakkikā
analyzed: khalaggam nāma manussehi diyyamānam dhaññam gaṇhanti tam ime na gaṇhanti iti an aggi pakkikā

original: nāma jātā. Asāmapākāti asayaṃpācakā. Asmamuṭṭhinā muṭṭhipāsāṇena vattantīti asmamuṭṭhikā.
analyzed: nāma jātāḥ a sāmapākā ati a sayaṃpācakāḥ asmamuṭṭhinā muṭṭhi pāsāṇena vattanti iti asmamuṭṭhikā

original: Dantena uppāṭitaṃ vakkalaṃ rukkhattaco dantavakkalaṃ, tena vattantīti dantavakkalikā.
analyzed: dantena uppāṭitam vakkalam rukkha ttacaḥ dantavakkalam tena vattanti iti dantavakkalikā

original: Pavattaṃ rukkhādito pātitaṃ phalaṃ bhuñjantīti pavattaphalabhojino. Jiṇṇapakkatāya
analyzed: pavattam rukkha āditaḥ pātitam phalam bhuñjanti iti pavatta phala bhojinaḥ jiṇṇa pakka tāya

original: paṇḍubhūtaṃ palāsaṃ, taṃsadisañca paṇḍupalāsaṃ, tena vattantīti paṇḍupalāsikā, sayaṃpatitapupphaphalapattabhojino.

original: Idāni te aṭṭhavidhepi sarūpato dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Saṅkaḍḍhitvāti bhikkhācariyāvasena laddhadhaññaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā.
analyzed: idāni te aṭṭhavidhe api sarūpataḥ dassetum tattha atiādi vuttam saṅkaḍḍhitvā ti bhikkhā cariyā vasena laddha dhaññam ekajjham katvā

original: Pariyeṭṭhi nāma dukkhāti paresaṃ gehato gehaṃ gantvā pariyeṭṭhi nāma dīnavuttibhāvena dukkhā. Pāsāṇassa pariggaho dukkho pabbajitassāti vā danteheva uppāṭetvā khādanti.
analyzed: pariyeṭṭhi nāma dukkhā ti paresam gehataḥ geham gantvā pariyeṭṭhi nāma dīna vutti bhāvena dukkhā pāsāṇassa pariggahaḥ dukkhaḥ pabbajitassa ati vā dantehi iva uppāṭetvā khādanti

original: Imāhi catūhiyevāti “khārividhaṃ ādāyā”tiādinā vuttāhi catūhi eva tāpasapabbajjāhīti.
analyzed: imāhi khāri vidham ādāya ati ādinā vuttāhi catūhi eva tāpasa pabbajjāhi iti

original: 282. Apāye vināse niyutto āpāyiko. Tabbhāvaṃ paripūretuṃ asakkonto tena aparipuṇṇo aparipūramāno, karaṇe cetaṃ paccattavacanaṃ, tenāha “āpāyikenāpi aparipūramānenā”ti.
analyzed: apāye vināse niyuttaḥ āpāyiko tad bhāvam paripūretum asakkonto tena a paripuṇṇaḥ a paripūramānaḥ karaṇe ca itam paccatta vacanam tena āha āpāyikena api a paripūramānena ati

original: Pubbakaisibhāvānuyogavaṇṇanā
283. Dīyatīti datti, dattiyeva dattikanti āha “dinnaka”nti. Yadi brāhmaṇassa sammukhībhāvo
analyzed: dīyati iti datti dattiyā iva dattikanti āha dinnakanti yadi brāhmaṇassa sammukhībhāvaḥ

original: rañño na dātabbo, kasmāssa upasaṅkamanaṃ na paṭikkhittanti āha “yasmā panā”tiādi.
analyzed: raññaḥ na dātabbaḥ kasmā assa upasaṅkamanam na paṭikkhittanti āha yasmā pana atiādi

original: mammavacanaṃ avocāti tattha kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “idaṃ pana kāraṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: avoca ti tattha kāraṇam dassetuṃ idam pana kāraṇa ntiādi vuttaṃ

original: 284. Rathūpatthareti rathassa upari attharitapadese. Pākaṭamantananti pakāsabhūtaṃ mantanaṃ. Tañhi suddādīhi ñāyatīti na rahassamantanaṃ. Bhaṇatīti api nu bhaṇati.
analyzed: rathūpattharā iti rathassa upari attharita padese pākaṭa mantanam ti pakāsa bhūtam mantanam tat hi sudda ādīhi ñāyati iti na rahassa mantanam bhaṇati iti api nu bhaṇati

analyzed: pavattāraḥ ti pāvacana bhāvena vattāraḥ yasmā te tesam mantānam pavattakā tasmā

analyzed: etthā iva hi tassa saṃsayo tanu mudu sukumāra tā ādīsu panassa guṇesu vicāraṇā eva na ahosi

original: 288. Hirikaraṇokāsanti hiriyitabbaṭṭhānaṃ. Chāyanti paṭibimbaṃ. Kathaṃ kīdisanti
analyzed: hiri karaṇa ukāsanti hiriyitabba ṭṭhānam chāyanti paṭibimbam katham kīdisanti

original: upanetvā, tenāha “suṭṭhudāsādibhāvaṃ āropetvā”ti. Pātesīti pavaṭṭanavasena pātesi.

original: Pokkharasātibuddhūpasaṅkamanavaṇṇanā
293-6. Āgamā nūti āgato nu. Khoti nipātamattaṃ. Idhāti ettha, tumhākaṃ santikanti attho. Adhivāsetūti sādiyatu, taṃ pana sādiyanaṃ manasā sampaṭiggaho hotīti āha “sampaṭicchatū”ti.
analyzed: āgamā nu iti āgataḥ nu khalu iti nipāta mattam idha ati ettha tumhākam santikam ti atthaḥ adhivāsetu uti sādiyatu tam pana sādiyanam manasā sampaṭiggahaḥ hoti iti āha sampaṭicchatu uti

original: 297. Yāvadatthanti yāva attho, tāva bhojanena tadā katanti attho. Oṇittanti āmisāpanayanena sucikataṃ, tenāha “hatthe ca pattañca dhovitvā”ti.

original: 343. Ākaroti attano anurūpatāya samariyādaṃ saparicchedaṃ phalaṃ nibbattetīti ākāro,
analyzed: ākaroti attanaḥ anurūpa tāya sa mariyādam sa paricchedam phalam nibbatteti iti ākāraḥ

original: Niccadānaanukulayaññavaṇṇanā
analyzed: nicca dāna anu kula yañña vaṇṇanā

analyzed: manussā catūhi paccayehi sakkaccam upaṭṭhahanti tena vuttam āvāsam dentena nāma

analyzed: uṇhanti aggi santāpam tassa vana ḍāha ādīsu vana dāha ādīsu vā

original: Attano paccanīkakilesā diṭṭhekaṭṭhā avijjādayo. Passatīti pakāseti kiccapaṭivedhena

original: aṅgena tattha paccavekkhaṇā pavattatīti tathevāti attano paccanīkakilesehi saddhinti attho.

original: Kiccatoti pubbabhāgehi dukkhādiñāṇehi kātabbassa kiccassa idha sātisayaṃ nipphattito

analyzed: sikkhāpada vibhaṅge virati cetanā sabbe sampayutta dhammā ca sikkhāpadāni iti vuccanti iti

original: vitakkādīnaṃ vasena catūhi jhānehi sammāsamādhi vibhatto, tathāpi vāyāmo viya anuppannākusalānuppādanādicatuvāyāmakiccaṃ,

analyzed: tassa ati sammādiṭṭhiyā bahu kāro iti vatvā tam bahu kāratam upamāya vibhāvetum yathā

original: vā. Samannesitvāti upadhāretvā.

original: Dvepabbajitavatthuvaṇṇanā
analyzed: dvepabbajita vatthu vaṇṇanā

12. Lohiccasuttavaṇṇanā
Lohiccabrāhmaṇavatthuvaṇṇanā
501. Sālavatikāti itthiliṅgavasena tassa gāmassa nāmaṃ. Gāmaṇikābhāvenāti keci. Lohito nāma tassa kule pubbapuriso, tassa vasena lohiccoti tassa brāhmaṇassa gottato āgataṃ nāmaṃ.
analyzed: sālavatikā ti itthi liṅga vasena tassa gāmassa nāmam gāmaṇikā bhāvena ati keci lohitaḥ nāma tassa kule pubba puriso tassa vasena lohiccaḥ ti tassa brāhmaṇassa gottataḥ āgatam nāmam

original: 502. “Diṭṭhigata”nti laddhimattaṃ adhippetanti āha “na pana ucchedasassatānaṃ aññatara”nti.
analyzed: diṭṭhi gatam ti laddhimattam adhippetanti āha na pana uccheda sassatānam aññataran ti

original: Na hi ucchedasassatagāhavinimutto koci diṭṭhigāho atthi. “Bhāsati yevā”ti tassā laddhiyā
analyzed: na hi uccheda sassata gāha vinimutto koci diṭṭhi gāho atthi bhāsati yā iva ati tassā laddhiyā

analyzed: loke pākaṭa bhāvam dasseti attataḥ añño paro ti yathā anusāsakataḥ anusāsitabbo paro

analyzed: evam anusāsitabbato pi anusāsako paroti vuttam paraḥ parassa ati paraḥ yaḥ ti ādi kim sadda apekkhāya

analyzed: ca ittha karissati iti anāgata kāla vacanam anāgate pi vā tena tassa kātabbam natthi iti

original: ca tittiriisinā kate mante sajjhāyanti, te tittiriyā, yajubbedino eva. Yajubbedasākhā
analyzed: ca kate mante sajjhāyanti te tittiriyāḥ yajuḥ bedinaḥ eva yajuḥ beda sākhā

original: hesā, yadidaṃ tittiraṃ. Chando vuccati visesato sāmavedo, taṃ sarena kāyantīti chandokā,
analyzed: ha isā yat idam tittiram chandaḥ vuccati visesato sāmavedaḥ tam sarena kāyanti iti chandokā

original: sāmavedino. “Chandogā”tipi paṭhanti, so evattho. Bahavo irayo etthāti bavhāri, irubbedo.

original: Taṃ adhīyantīti bavhārijjhā.
analyzed: tam adhīyanti iti bavhārijjhā

analyzed: nigamassa vā pavesāya honti evam brāhmaṇehi paññāpiyamānā api nānā maggā brahma loka upagamanāya

original: 530. Yatoti bhummatthe nissakkavacanaṃ, sāmaññajotanā ca visese avatiṭṭhatīti āha

original: Aciravatīnadīupamākathāvaṇṇanā
542. Samabharitāti sampuṇṇā. Tato eva kākapeyyā. Pārāti paratīraṃ. Apāranti orimatīraṃ. Ehīti āgaccha.
analyzed: sama bharitā ati sampuṇṇā tatas eva kākapeyyā para tīram orima tīram ehi iti āgaccha

original: 544. Pañcasīla…pe… veditabbā yamaniyamādibrāhmaṇadhammānaṃ tadantogadhabhāvato. Tabbiparītāti

original: nadi upamāya saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ.
analyzed: nadi upamāya saṅgaṇhana attham

original: 546. Kāmayitabbaṭṭhenāti kāmanīyabhāvena. Bandhanaṭṭhenāti teneva kāmetabbabhāvena

analyzed: sattānam cittassa ābandhana bhāvena kāmañca ayam guṇa saddo atthantaresu pi diṭṭha ppayogo

original: tesaṃ panettha asambhavato pārisesañāyena bandhanaṭṭheyeva yuttoti dassetuṃ “anujānāmī”tiādinā
analyzed: tesam pana ittha asambhavataḥ pārisesa ñāyena bandhana ṭṭheyā iva yuttaḥ ti dassetum anujānāmi itiādinā

analyzed: hi na īsam kāmetabba tā tad aggena bandhana bhāvaḥ ca ati

original: “Asaṅkhyeyyāni nāmāni, saguṇena mahesino;
analyzed: asaṅkhyeyyāni nāmāni saguṇena mahesino

original: Guṇena nāmamuddheyyaṃ, api nāmasahassato”ti. ;
analyzed: guṇena nāmam uddheyyam api

original: Ādīsu sopi idha na yujjatīti anuddhaṭo.
analyzed: ādīsu saḥ api idha na yujjati iti anuddhaṭaḥ

original: Cakkhuviññeyyāti cakkhuviññāṇena vijānitabbā, tena pana vijānanaṃ dassanamevāti āha

analyzed: passitabbā ati sota viññāṇena sotabbā ati evamādi etena upāyena ati atidisati gavesitam pi

original: “iṭṭha”nti vuccati, taṃ idha nādhippetanti āha “pariyiṭṭhā vā hontu mā vā”ti. Iṭṭhārammaṇabhūtāti
analyzed: iṭṭhanti vuccati tam idha na adhippetanti āha pariyiṭṭhāḥ vā hontu mā vā ati iṭṭha ārammaṇa bhūtā ati

analyzed: sukha ārammaṇa bhūtā kāmanīyā ati kāmetabbā iṭṭha bhāvena manam appāyanti iti manāpā piya jātikā ati piya sabhāvā

original: Gedhenāti lobhena abhibhūtā hutvā pañcakāmaguṇe paribhuñjantīti yojanā. Mucchākāranti

original: imamatthaṃ dassento “idametthā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: imam attham dassentaḥ idam ettha atiādim āha

original: 548-9. Āvarantīti kusalappavattiṃ āditova nivārenti. Nivārentīti niravasesato vārayanti.
analyzed: āvaranti iti kusala ppavattim āditas va nivārenti nivārenti iti niravasesataḥ vārayanti

original: daḷhataratamādibhāvappattā vuttā.
analyzed: daḷhataratama ādi bhāva ppattā vuttā

original: Saṃsandanakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: saṃsandana kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Cittagatikāti cittavasikā, tenāha cittassa vase vattantī”ti. Na tādisoti brāhmaṇā

original: Saṃsīditvāti nimmujjitvā. Sukkhataraṇaṃ maññe tarantīti sukkhanaditaraṇaṃ taranti

original: teti yathā te “samatala”nti saññāya paṅkaṃ otiṇṇā. Idheva cāti imasmiñca attabhāve.

original: Sukhaṃ vā sātaṃ vā na labhantīti jhānasukhaṃ vā vipassanāsātaṃ vā na labhanti, kuto

original: Parivattitumpi na sakkā honti mahākaṇṭakatāya. Ñātīnaṃ byasanaṃ vināso ñātibyasanaṃ.

original: Evaṃ bhogasīlabyasanāni veditabbāni. Rogo eva byasati vibādhatīti rogabyasanaṃ. Evaṃ
analyzed: evam bhoga sīla byasanāni veditabbāni rogaḥ eva vibādhati iti roga byasanam evam

original: diṭṭhibyasanampi daṭṭhabbaṃ.

analyzed: tam pana saṃsaya vasena cirāyanam nāma hoti iti āha kaṅkhā vasena

analyzed: sārajjitattam aṭṭhakathāyam pana vitthāyitattam nāma chambhitattanti adhippāyena

original: “thaddhabhāvaggahaṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: tha ddha bhāva ggahaṇam ti vuttam

analyzed: u iti upasagga yoge lumpa saddaḥ uddharaṇa atthaḥ hoti iti ullumpatu iti padassa uddharatu iti attham āha upasagga vasena hi dhātu saddāḥ attha visesa vuttinaḥ honti yathā uddharatu iti

original: Brahmalokamaggadesanāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: brahmaloka magga desanā vaṇṇanā

original: sammadeva cetaso vimuttibhāvato.
analyzed: sammat eva cetasaḥ vimutti bhāvataḥ

original: Pamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ nāma kāmāvacaraṃ pamāṇakarānaṃ saṃkilesadhammānaṃ avikkhambhanato.
analyzed: pamāṇa katam kammam nāma kāmāvacaram pamāṇa karānam saṃkilesa dhammānam a vikkhambhanato

original: Tathā hi taṃ brahmavihārapubbabhāgabhūtaṃ pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā odissakaanodissakadisāpharaṇavasena
analyzed: tathā hi tam brahmavihāra pubbabhāga bhūtam pamāṇam atikkamitvā odissaka anodissaka disā pharaṇa vasena

original: vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkā. Vuttavipariyāyato pana appamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ nāma rūpārūpāvacaraṃ,
analyzed: vaḍḍhetum na sakkā vutta vipariyāyataḥ pana appamāṇa katam kammam nāma rūpa arūpa avacaram

original: tenāha “tañhī”tiādi. Tattha arūpāvacare odissakānodissakavasena pharaṇaṃ na labbhati, tathā disāpharaṇaṃ.
analyzed: tena āha tat hi itiādi tattha arūpāvacare odissaka anodissaka vasena pharaṇam na labbhati tathā disā pharaṇam

original: Keci pana taṃ āgamanavasena labbhatīti vadanti, tadayuttaṃ. Na hi brahmavihāranissando
analyzed: keci pana tam āgamana vasena labbhati iti vadanti tat ayuttam na hi brahmavihāra nissandaḥ

original: āruppaṃ, atha kho kasiṇanissando, tasmā yaṃ suvibhāvitaṃ vasībhāvaṃ pāpitaṃ āruppaṃ,
analyzed: āruppam atha kho kasiṇa nissandaḥ tasmai yam su vibhāvitam vasībhāvam pāpitam āruppam

original: taṃ “appamāṇakata”nti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yaṃ vā sātisayaṃ brahmavihārabhāvanāya
analyzed: tam appamāṇakatam ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbam yam vā sa atisayam brahmavihāra bhāvanāya

original: abhisaṅkhatena santānena nibbattitaṃ, yañca brahmavihārasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya samāpannaṃ
analyzed: abhisaṅkhatena santānena nibbattitam yat ca brahmavihāra samāpattitaḥ vuṭṭhāya samāpannam

original: arūpāvacarajjhānaṃ, taṃ iminā pariyāyena pharaṇappamāṇavasena appamāṇakatanti vattuṃ
analyzed: arūpāvacara jhānam tam iminā pariyāyena pharaṇa pamāṇa vasena appamāṇaka tat ti vattum

original: vaṭṭatīti apare. Vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: vaṭṭati iti apare vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbam

original: Rūpāvacarārūpāvacarakammeti rūpāvacarakamme, arūpāvacarakamme ca sati. Na ohīyati
analyzed: rūpāvacara arūpāvacara kammā iti rūpāvacara kamme arūpāvacara kamme ca sati na ohīyati

original: na tiṭṭhatīti katūpacitampi kāmāvacarakammaṃ yathādhigate mahaggatajjhāne aparihīne
analyzed: na tiṭṭhati iti katu upacitam pi kāmāvacara kammam yathā adhigate mahaggata jhāne a parihīne

original: taṃ abhibhavitvā paṭibāhitvā sayaṃ ohīyakaṃ hutvā paṭisandhiṃ dātuṃ samatthabhāve
analyzed: tam abhibhavitvā paṭibāhitvā sayam ohīyakam hutvā paṭisandhim dātum samattha bhāve

original: na tiṭṭhati. Laggitunti āvarituṃ nisedhetuṃ. Ṭhātunti paṭibalo hutvā ṭhātuṃ. Pharitvāti
analyzed: na tiṭṭhati laggitunti āvaritum nisedhetum ṭhātunti paṭibalaḥ hutvā ṭhātum pharitvā iti

original: paṭippharitvā. Pariyādiyitvāti tassa sāmatthiyaṃ khepetvā. Kammassa pariyādiyanaṃ
analyzed: paṭippharitvā pariyādiyitvā ti tassa sāmatthiyam khepetvā kammassa pariyādiyanam

original: nāma tassa vipākuppādanaṃ nisedhetvā attano vipākuppādananti āha “tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā”tiādi.
analyzed: nāma tassa vipāka uppādanam nisedhetvā attanaḥ vipāka uppādanam ti āha tassa vipākam paṭibāhitvā atiādi

original: Evaṃ mettādivihārīti evaṃ vuttānaṃ mettādīnaṃ brahmavihārānaṃ vasena mettādivihārī.
analyzed: evam metta ādi vihārī iti evam vuttānam metta ādīnam brahmavihārānam vasena metta ādi vihārī

original: 559. Aggaññasutte…pe… alatthunti aggaññasutte āgatanayena upasampadañceva arahattañca alatthuṃ paṭilabhiṃsu. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
analyzed: aggañña sutta īpe alatthum ti aggañña sutte āgata nayena upasampadam ca iva arahattam ca paṭilabhiṃsu sesam su viññeyyam eva

original: Tevijjasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā.
Niṭṭhitā ca terasasuttapaṭimaṇḍitassa sīlakkhandhavaggassa atthavaṇṇanāya
analyzed: niṭṭhitā ca terasa sutta paṭimaṇḍitassa sīlakkhandha vaggassa attha vaṇṇanāya

original: Līnatthappakāsanāti.
analyzed: līna attha ppakāsanā ti

original: Sīlakkhandhavaggaṭīkā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: sīlakkhandha vagga ṭīkā niṭṭhitā
